5797529Di2015UniqueSeparatorDelegate.CreateDelegate
5797529Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyClass Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler TheEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void TestIt()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TheEvent += (sender, eventargs) => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Handled!"); // do something in the handlerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get a delegate representing this anonymous function we are inDi2015NewLine            var fn = (EventHandler)Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine                             typeof(EventHandler), sender, Di2015NewLine                             (MethodInfo)MethodInfo.GetCurrentMethod());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // unregister this lambda when it is runDi2015NewLine            TheEvent -= fn;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // first time around this will output a line to the consoleDi2015NewLine        TheEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // second time around there are no handlers attached and it will throw a NullReferenceExceptionDi2015NewLine        TheEvent(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5797782Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static DataTable GetEmployeeData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        string[] columnValues;Di2015NewLine        char[] columnSeperator = new char[] { ',' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileStream employeeFile = new FileStream(@"..\\..\\EmployeeDetails.txt", FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine            StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(employeeFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Obtain the columns from the first line.Di2015NewLine            line = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            columnValues = line.Split(columnSeperator);Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x <= columnValues.GetUpperBound(0); x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add the column to the tableDi2015NewLine                dt.Columns.Add(columnValues[x]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            line = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            while (line != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Split row of data into string arrayDi2015NewLine                columnValues = line.Split(columnSeperator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // add a new row with all of the valuesDi2015NewLine                dt.Rows.Add(columnValues);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sr.Close();Di2015NewLine            return dt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("An IO exception has been thrown!");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            return dt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5802832Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Animation helper class.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class AnimationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Keyframe> keyframes = new List<Keyframe>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int timeline;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastFrame = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool run = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int currentIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Construct new animation helper.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Animation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddKeyframe(int time, float value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Keyframe k = new Keyframe();Di2015NewLine        k.time = time;Di2015NewLine        k.value = value;Di2015NewLine        keyframes.Add(k);Di2015NewLine        keyframes.Sort(delegate(Keyframe a, Keyframe b) { return a.time.CompareTo(b.time); });Di2015NewLine        lastFrame = (time > lastFrame) ? time : lastFrame;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timeline = 0;Di2015NewLine        currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        run = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Update(GameTime gameTime, ref float value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (run)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timeline += gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.Milliseconds;Di2015NewLine            value = MathHelper.SmoothStep(keyframes[currentIndex].value, keyframes[currentIndex + 1].value, (float)timeline / (float)keyframes[currentIndex + 1].time);Di2015NewLine            if (timeline >= keyframes[currentIndex + 1].time && currentIndex != keyframes.Count) { currentIndex++; }Di2015NewLine            if (timeline >= lastFrame) { run = false; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public struct KeyframeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int time;Di2015NewLine        public float value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5806795Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Vertex> DepthFirstTraversal(Di2015NewLine        this IGraph graph, Di2015NewLine        Vertex start) Di2015NewLine    { ... }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5806795Di2015UniqueSeparatorIGraph myGraph = whatever;Di2015NewLineVertex start = whatever;Di2015NewLineVertex result = myGraph.DepthFirstTraversal(start)Di2015NewLine                       .Where(v=>something)Di2015NewLine                       .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine
5806795Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Vertex> DepthFirstTraversal(Di2015NewLine    this IGraph graph, Di2015NewLine    Vertex start) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var visited = new HashSet<Vertex>();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<Vertex>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(start);Di2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        visited.Add(current);Di2015NewLine        yield return current;Di2015NewLine        var neighbours = graph.GetNeighbours(current)Di2015NewLine                              .Where(n=>!visited.Contains(n));Di2015NewLine        // If you don't care about the left-to-right order, remove the ReverseDi2015NewLine        foreach(var neighbour in neighbours.Reverse()) Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(neighbour);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5807238Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar shuffled = originalSequence.Shuffle().Take(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine    return source.Shuffle(rng);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (rng == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("rng");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.ShuffleIterator(rng);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> ShuffleIterator<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buffer = source.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < buffer.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j = rng.Next(i, buffer.Count);Di2015NewLine        yield return buffer[j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        buffer[j] = buffer[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5808394Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace sbcjc.seiDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        public class JsEncoderDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            static Regex EncodeLiteralRegex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Format a bunch of literals.Di2015NewLine            public static string Format (string format, params object[] items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Format(format,Di2015NewLine                    items.Select(item => EncodeString("" + item)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Given a string, return a string suitable for safeDi2015NewLine            // use within a Javascript literal inside a <script> block.Di2015NewLine            // This approach errs on the side of "ugly" escaping.Di2015NewLine            public static string EncodeString (string value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (EncodeLiteralRegex == null) {Di2015NewLine                    // initial accept "space to ~" in ASCII then reject quotes Di2015NewLine                    // and some XML chars (this avoids `</script>`, `<![CDATA[..]]>>`, and XML vs HTML issues)Di2015NewLine                    // "/" is not allowed because it requires an escape in JSONDi2015NewLine                    var accepted = Enumerable.Range(32, 127 - 32)Di2015NewLine                        .Except(new int[] { '"', '\\'', '\\\\', '&', '<', '>', '/' });Di2015NewLine                    // pattern matches everything but acceptedDi2015NewLine                    EncodeLiteralRegex = new Regex("[^" +Di2015NewLine                        string.Join("", accepted.Select(c => @"\\x" + c.ToString("x2")).ToArray())Di2015NewLine                        + "]");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return EncodeLiteralRegex.Replace(value ?? "", (match) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var ch = (int)match.Value[0]; // only matches a character at a timeDi2015NewLine                    return ch <= 127Di2015NewLine                        ? @"\\x" + ch.ToString("x2") // not JSONDi2015NewLine                        : @"\\u" + ch.ToString("x4");Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5815132Di2015UniqueSeparatorCartesianProduct
5815132Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CrossProduct<T>(Di2015NewLine     this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> accumulator = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine    var firstSequence = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var sequence in sequences)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var local = new List<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var accseq in accumulator)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!firstSequence)Di2015NewLine                result.Add(accseq);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in sequence)Di2015NewLine                local.Add(accseq.Concat(new[] { item }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        firstSequence = false;Di2015NewLine        accumulator = local;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.Concat(accumulator);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5815347Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<Employee> CreateSortList<T>(Di2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<Employee> dataSource,Di2015NewLine                    string fieldName, SortDirection sortDirection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Employee> returnList = new List<Employee>();Di2015NewLine        returnList.AddRange(dataSource);Di2015NewLine        // get property from field name passedDi2015NewLine        System.Reflection.PropertyInfo propInfo = typeof(T).GetProperty(fieldName);Di2015NewLine        Comparison<Employee> compare = delegate(Employee a, Employee b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool asc = sortDirection == SortDirection.Ascending;Di2015NewLine            object valueA = asc ? propInfo.GetValue(a, null) : propInfo.GetValue(b, null);Di2015NewLine            object valueB = asc ? propInfo.GetValue(b, null) : propInfo.GetValue(a, null);Di2015NewLine            //comparing the itemsDi2015NewLine            return valueA is IComparable ? ((IComparable)valueA).CompareTo(valueB) : 0;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        returnList.Sort(compare);Di2015NewLine        return returnList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5816055Di2015UniqueSeparatorBrush
5816055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PercentToBrushConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3722307/is-there-an-easy-way-to-blend-two-system-drawing-color-values/3722337#3722337Di2015NewLine    private Color Blend(Color color, Color backColor, double amount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte r = (byte)((color.R * amount) + backColor.R * (1 - amount));Di2015NewLine        byte g = (byte)((color.G * amount) + backColor.G * (1 - amount));Di2015NewLine        byte b = (byte)((color.B * amount) + backColor.B * (1 - amount));Di2015NewLine        return Color.FromRgb(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Assumes the percent property to be an int.Di2015NewLine        int input = (int)value;Di2015NewLine        Color red = Colors.Red;Di2015NewLine        Color yellow = Colors.Yellow;Di2015NewLine        Color green = Colors.Green;Di2015NewLine        Color color;Di2015NewLine        if (input <= 50)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            color = Blend(yellow, red, (double)input/50);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            color = Blend(green, yellow, (double)(input - 50) / 50);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new SolidColorBrush(color);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5817920Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[,] linePoints;Di2015NewLine
5817920Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[,] linePoints =Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { -3, -3 },Di2015NewLine        { -2, -2 },Di2015NewLine        { -1, -1 },Di2015NewLine        { 0, 0 },Di2015NewLine        { 1, 1 },Di2015NewLine        { 2, 2 },Di2015NewLine        { 3, 3 },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    int N = 2;Di2015NewLine    int M = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // start of the code you're asking forDi2015NewLine    int width = linePoints.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    int newHeight = linePoints.GetLength(0) - (N + M);Di2015NewLine    int[,] newLinePoints = new int[newHeight, width];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < newHeight; y++)Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine            newLinePoints[y, x] = linePoints[N + y, x];Di2015NewLine    // end of the code you're asking forDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    linePoints.Dump();Di2015NewLine    newLinePoints.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5819064Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct { double x, y, r; } Circle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool circleIsAllowed(const std::vector<Circle>& circles, const Circle& newCircle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   for(std::vector<Circle>::const_iterator it = circles.begin(); it != circles.end(); ++it) // foreach(Circle it in circles)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      double sumR = it->r + newCircle.r; // + minimumDistanceBetweenCircles (if you want)Di2015NewLine      double dx = it->x - newCircle.x;Di2015NewLine      double dy = it->y - newCircle.y;Di2015NewLine      double squaredDist = dx*dx + dy*dy;Di2015NewLine      if (squaredDist < sumR*sumR) return false;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return true; // no existing circle overlapsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5819440Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IFactoryRule Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool CanInstantiate(PropertySet propSet);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5819440Di2015UniqueSeparator// compares property set to given parametersDi2015NewLinepublic SimpleRule : IFactoryRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int a,b,c;Di2015NewLine    public SimpleRule(a,b,c) { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CanInstantiate(PropertySet propSet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            propSet.a == a &&Di2015NewLine            propSet.b == b &&Di2015NewLine            propSet.c == c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5819440Di2015UniqueSeparator// compares property set using a delegateDi2015NewLinepublic ComplexRule : IFactoryRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<PropertySet, bool> _func;Di2015NewLine    public ComplexRule(func) { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CanInstantiate(PropertySet propSet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _func(propSet);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5819440Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassFactoryDi2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    private static List<Tuple<IFactoryRule, Func<IMyClass>>> _rules = new List();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static MyClassFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // rules are evaluated in this same orderDi2015NewLine        _rules.Add(new SimpleRule(1,2,3), () => new Simple());Di2015NewLine        _rules.Add(new ComplexRule(p => p.a + p.b == p.c), () => new Complex());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IMyClass Create(PropertySet pset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pset == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("pset");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // try to find a matchDi2015NewLine        Tuple<IFactoryRule, Func<IMyClass>> rule = Di2015NewLine            _rules.FirstOrDefault(r => r.First.CanInstantiate(pset));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (rule == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                "Unsupported property set: " + pset.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // invoke constructor delegateDi2015NewLine        return rule.Second();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5820910Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar bars = from tick in ticksDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Calculate the chronological, natural-time, intra-day index Di2015NewLine           // of the bar associated with a tick.Di2015NewLine           let barIndexForDay = tick.Timestamp.TimeOfDay.Ticks / barSizeInTicksDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Calculate the begin-time of the bar associated with a tick.Di2015NewLine           // For example, turn 2011/04/28 14:23.45 Di2015NewLine           // into 2011/04/28 14:20.00, assuming 5 min bars.Di2015NewLine           let barBeginDateTime = tick.Timestamp.Date.AddTicksDi2015NewLine                              (barIndexForDay * barSizeInTicks)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Produce raw tick-data for each bar by grouping.Di2015NewLine           group tick by barBeginDateTime into tickGroupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // Order prices for a group chronologically.Di2015NewLine           let orderedPrices = tickGroup.OrderBy(t => t.Timestamp)Di2015NewLine                                        .Select(t => t.Price)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           select new BarDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                Open = orderedPrices.First(),Di2015NewLine                Close = orderedPrices.Last(),Di2015NewLine                High = orderedPrices.Max(),Di2015NewLine                Low = orderedPrices.Min(),Di2015NewLine                BeginTime = tickGroup.Key,Di2015NewLine                EndTime = tickGroup.Key.AddTicks(barSizeInTicks)Di2015NewLine           };Di2015NewLine

5821884Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Security;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass HarvestSampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   //This is used to validate the certificate the server gives you, it allays assumes the cert is valid.Di2015NewLine   public static bool Validator (object sender, X509Certificate certificate, X509Chain chain, SslPolicyErrors sslPolicyErrors) {Di2015NewLine     return true;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      //setting up the initial request.Di2015NewLine      HttpWebRequest request;Di2015NewLine      HttpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLine      StreamReader reader;Di2015NewLine      StringBuilder sbSource;Di2015NewLine      // 1. Set some variables specific to your account.Di2015NewLine      //This is the URL that you will be doing your REST call against. think of it as a function in normal library.Di2015NewLine      string uri = "https://yoursubdomain.harvestapp.com/projects";Di2015NewLine      string username="youremail@somewhere.com";Di2015NewLine      string password="yourharvestpassword";Di2015NewLine      string usernamePassword = username + ":" + password;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //This checks the SSL cert that the server will give us, the function is above this one.Di2015NewLine      ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback = Validator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         //more setup of the connectionDi2015NewLine         request = WebRequest.Create(uri) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine         request.MaximumAutomaticRedirections = 1;Di2015NewLine         request.AllowAutoRedirect = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // 2. It's important that both the Accept and ContentType headers areDi2015NewLine         // set in order for this to be interpreted as an API request.Di2015NewLine         request.Accept = "application/xml";Di2015NewLine         request.ContentType = "application/xml";Di2015NewLine         request.UserAgent = "harvest_api_sample.cs";Di2015NewLine         // 3. Print out the XML of all projects for this account.Di2015NewLine               Console.WriteLine(sbSource.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (WebException wex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (wex.Response != null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            using (HttpWebResponse errorResponse = (HttpWebResponse)wex.Response)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                     "The server returned '{0}' with the status code {1} ({2:d}).",Di2015NewLine                     errorResponse.StatusDescription, errorResponse.StatusCode,Di2015NewLine                     errorResponse.StatusCode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         } else {Di2015NewLine               Console.WriteLine( wex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine      } finally {Di2015NewLine         if (response != null) { response.Close(); }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5823880Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Producer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (i < 500)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(50); // can remove the sleep just for debuggingDi2015NewLine                bc.ProducerAdd("Notification " + i);Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Consumer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var it in bc)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0} : CONSUMES {1}", Thread.CurrentThread.Name, it));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // this is just a check testDi2015NewLine                    lock (consumed)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        consumed.Add(it, Convert.ToInt32(it.Split(' ')[1])); // this will fail if we consume the same twiceDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void TogglePause()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(3000); //every 3 secondsDi2015NewLine                bc.Paused = !bc.Paused;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("PAUSE is now: " + bc.Paused);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static QueuedBlockingCollection<string> bc = new QueuedBlockingCollection<string>();Di2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<string, int> consumed = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The main entry point for the application.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread producer = new Thread(Producer);Di2015NewLine            producer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread consumer1 = new Thread(Consumer);Di2015NewLine            consumer1.Name = "Consumer 1";Di2015NewLine            consumer1.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread consumer2 = new Thread(Consumer);Di2015NewLine            consumer2.Name = "Consumer 2";Di2015NewLine            consumer2.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread pauser = new Thread(TogglePause);Di2015NewLine            pauser.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // wait and observe console writelinesDi2015NewLine                Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class QueuedBlockingCollection<T> : IEnumerable<T>, ICollection, IEnumerable, IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Queue<T> queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine        private BlockingCollection<T> collection = new BlockingCollection<T>();Di2015NewLine        private Thread syncThread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Paused { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public bool Exiting { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SyncLoop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this while will wait for the class to be destroyedDi2015NewLine            while (!Exiting)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // this while will finish when queue is synched to collection, or paused or exitingDi2015NewLine                    while (queue.Count > 0 && !Exiting && !Paused)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        lock (collection)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            T item = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                            collection.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine(String.Format("SYNCHED {0} TO COLLECTION", item));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // collection has been disposed, exit this threadDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void ProducerAdd(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // producer always adds to the queue if the collection is paused so it wont block the collectionDi2015NewLine            // the sync thread will block the collection only when adding from the queueDi2015NewLine            // consumers automatically block this collection when enumerating because it is a wrapper to the internal blocked coll...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!Paused)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (collection)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    collection.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Producer ADDED '" + item + "', status collection {0} queue {1}", this.Count, queue.Count));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Producer ENQUEUED '" + item + "', Status -> Collection: {0}, Queue: {1}", this.Count, queue.Count));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public QueuedBlockingCollection()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //collection.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine            syncThread = new Thread(SyncLoop);Di2015NewLine            syncThread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ~QueuedBlockingCollection()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Exiting = true;Di2015NewLine            syncThread.Join(200);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return collection.GetConsumingEnumerable().GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return collection.GetConsumingEnumerable().GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void CopyTo(Array array, int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var items = collection.GetConsumingEnumerable();Di2015NewLine            int offset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (array == null) throw new NullReferenceException("Array must be initialized");Di2015NewLine            if (array.Rank > 1) throw new InvalidOperationException("Array must have 1 dimension");Di2015NewLine            if (array.GetLength(0) - index < items.Count()) throw new IndexOutOfRangeException("Array is too small");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                array.SetValue(item, index + offset);Di2015NewLine                offset++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return collection.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsSynchronizedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return queue.Count == 0; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object SyncRootDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return collection; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            collection.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5828267Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<IObservable<TRet>> FromListCallbackPattern(Action<Action<List<TRet>>> function)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return () => {Di2015NewLine        // We use a ReplaySubject so that if people subscribe *after* theDi2015NewLine        // real method finishes, they'll still get all the itemsDi2015NewLine        ret = new ReplaySubject<TRet>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        function((list) => {Di2015NewLine            // We're going to "rebroadcast" the list onto the SubjectDi2015NewLine            // This isn't the most Rx'iest way to do this, but it is the mostDi2015NewLine            // comprehensible :)Di2015NewLine            foreach(var v in list) {Di2015NewLine                ret.OnNext(v);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ret.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5828863Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SuperQueue<T> : IDisposable where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly object _locker = new object();Di2015NewLine    readonly List<Thread> _workers;Di2015NewLine    readonly Queue<T> _taskQueue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    readonly Action<T> _dequeueAction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="SuperQueue{T}"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="workerCount">The worker count.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dequeueAction">The dequeue action.</param>Di2015NewLine    public SuperQueue(int workerCount, Action<T> dequeueAction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _dequeueAction = dequeueAction;Di2015NewLine        _workers = new List<Thread>(workerCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create and start a separate thread for each workerDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < workerCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(Consume) { IsBackground = true, Name = string.Format("SuperQueue worker {0}",i )};Di2015NewLine            _workers.Add(t);Di2015NewLine            t.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Enqueues the task.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="task">The task.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void EnqueueTask(T task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _taskQueue.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine            Monitor.PulseAll(_locker);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Consumes this instance.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    void Consume()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item;Di2015NewLine            lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (_taskQueue.Count == 0) Monitor.Wait(_locker);Di2015NewLine                item = _taskQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (item == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // run actual methodDi2015NewLine            _dequeueAction(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Enqueue one null task per worker to make each exit.Di2015NewLine        _workers.ForEach(thread => EnqueueTask(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _workers.ForEach(thread => thread.Join());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5828867Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CreatePDFDocument(string strHtml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string strFileName = HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("test.pdf");Di2015NewLine        // step 1: creation of a document-objectDi2015NewLine        Document document = new Document();Di2015NewLine        // step 2:Di2015NewLine        // we create a writer that listens to the documentDi2015NewLine        PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, new FileStream(strFileName, FileMode.Create));Di2015NewLine        StringReader se = new StringReader(strHtml);Di2015NewLine        HTMLWorker obj = new HTMLWorker(document);Di2015NewLine        document.Open();Di2015NewLine        obj.Parse(se);Di2015NewLine        document.Close();Di2015NewLine        ShowPdf(strFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void ShowPdf(string strFileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Response.ClearContent();Di2015NewLine        Response.ClearHeaders();Di2015NewLine        Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "inline;filename=" + strFileName);Di2015NewLine        Response.ContentType = "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine        Response.WriteFile(strFileName);Di2015NewLine        Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine        Response.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5843726Di2015UniqueSeparator//compute 1st verification digit.Di2015NewLinevar v1 = 10 * cpf[0] + // 10 x 0 = 0Di2015NewLine    9 * cpf[1] +       // 9  x 1 = 9Di2015NewLine    8 * cpf[2] +       // 8  x 2 = 16Di2015NewLine    7 * cpf[3] +       // 7  x 3 = 21Di2015NewLine    6 * cpf[4] +       // 6  x 4 = 24Di2015NewLine    5 * cpf[5] +       // 5  x 5 = 25Di2015NewLine    4 * cpf[6] +       // 4  x 6 = 24Di2015NewLine    3 * cpf[7] +       // 3  x 7 = 21Di2015NewLine    2 * cpf[8]         // 2  x 8 = 16Di2015NewLine; // result = 156Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinev1 = 11 - v1 % 11;     // 11 - 156 % 11 = 11 - 2 = 9Di2015NewLineif (v1 >= 10)Di2015NewLine    v1 = 0;            // 9 >= 10 ? v1 = 9Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//compute 2nd verification digit.Di2015NewLinevar v2 = 11 * cpf[0] + // 11 x 0 = 0Di2015NewLine    10 * cpf[1] +      // 10 x 1 = 10Di2015NewLine    9 * cpf[2] +       // 9  x 2 = 18Di2015NewLine    8 * cpf[3] +       // 8  x 3 = 24Di2015NewLine    7 * cpf[4] +       // 7  x 4 = 28Di2015NewLine    6 * cpf[5] +       // 6  x 5 = 30Di2015NewLine    5 * cpf[6] +       // 5  x 6 = 30Di2015NewLine    4 * cpf[7] +       // 4  x 7 = 28Di2015NewLine    3 * cpf[8]         // 3  x 8 = 24Di2015NewLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinev2 += 2 * v1;          // 192 + 2 * 9 = 192 + 18 = 210Di2015NewLinev2 = 11 - v2 % 11;     // 11 - 210 % 11 = 11 - 1 = 10Di2015NewLineif (v2 >= 10)Di2015NewLine    v2 = 0;            // 10 >= 10 ? v2 = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//True if verification digits are as expected.Di2015NewLine// v1 == 9 && v2 == 0Di2015NewLinereturn v1 == cpf[9] && v2 == cpf[10];Di2015NewLine

5843930Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DeviceDataQueue<TDevice, TData>Di2015NewLine    : IProducerConsumerCollection<Tuple<TDevice, TData>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object m_lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<TDevice, TData> m_dataDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<TDevice, TData>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<TDevice> m_queue = new Queue<TDevice>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //some obviously implemented methods elided, just make sure they are thread-safeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Count { get { return m_queue.Count; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object SyncRoot { get { return m_lockObject; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsSynchronized { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryAdd(Tuple<TDevice, TData> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var device = item.Item1;Di2015NewLine        var data = item.Item2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (m_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!m_data.ContainsKey(device))Di2015NewLine                m_queue.Enqueue(device);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_data[device] = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryTake(out Tuple<TDevice, TData> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_queue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item = null;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var device = m_queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            var data = m_data[device];Di2015NewLine            m_data.Remove(device);Di2015NewLine            item = Tuple.Create(device, data);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5850780Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PaginaCollector SlimWhere(this PaginaCollector paginaCollector, Expression<Func<WhereDummy, bool>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var mainExpression = expression.Body as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine    SubSonic.Where result = ParseFilter(mainExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (mainExpression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Equal:        Di2015NewLine            result.Comparison = Comparison.Equals;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return paginaCollector.Where(result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5850780Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static SubSonic.Where ParseFilter(BinaryExpression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var columnNameMethod = (MethodCallExpression)expression.Left;Di2015NewLine    var columnNameExpression = columnNameMethod.Arguments[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parameterValueExpression = expression.Right;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string columnName = GetValue<string>(columnNameExpression);Di2015NewLine    object parameterValue = GetValue<object>(parameterValueExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Where result = CreateWheteFilterDummy(columnName, parameterValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Where CreateWheteFilterDummy(string columnName, object parameterValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SubSonic.Where result = new Where();Di2015NewLine    result.ColumnName = columnName;Di2015NewLine    result.ParameterValue = parameterValue;Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T GetValue<T>(Expression columnNameExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var columnNameObjectMember = Expression.Convert(columnNameExpression, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var columnNameGetter = Expression.Lambda<Func<T>>(columnNameObjectMember);Di2015NewLine    return columnNameGetter.Compile()();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5850889Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Edit(FoodItem foodItem)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ModelState.IsValid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int id = foodItem.Id;Di2015NewLine        // Load food item with related categories firstDi2015NewLine        var item = context.FoodItemsDi2015NewLine                          .Include(f => f.Categories)Di2015NewLine                          .Single(f => f.Id == id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process changed scalar valuesDi2015NewLine        context.Entry(item).CurrentValues.SetValues(foodItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Brute force processing of relationsDi2015NewLine        // This can be optimized - instead of deleting all and adding all againDi2015NewLine        // you can manually compare which relations already exists, add new andDi2015NewLine        // remove non existing but let's make that as a homeworkDi2015NewLine        item.Categories.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var cList = Request["CategoryId"].Split(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var c in cList) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ci = Convert.ToInt32(c);Di2015NewLine            // Use find - if category was already loaded in the first query, it willDi2015NewLine            // be reused without additional query to DBDi2015NewLine            var category = context.Categories.Find(ci);Di2015NewLine            // Now add category to attached food item to create new relationDi2015NewLine            item.Categories.Add(category);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine        return RedirectToAction("Index");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View(foodItem);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5852362Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    Random rng = new Random();  Di2015NewLine    int n = list.Count;  Di2015NewLine    while (n > 1) {  Di2015NewLine        n--;  Di2015NewLine        int k = rng.Next(n + 1);  Di2015NewLine        T value = list[k];  Di2015NewLine        list[k] = list[n];  Di2015NewLine        list[n] = value;  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

lpModuleName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern void keybd_event(byte bVk, byte bScan, uint dwFlags, UIntPtr dwExtraInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate IntPtr LowLevelKeyboardProc(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Application.EnableVisualStyles();Di2015NewLine        Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _hookID = SetHook(_proc);Di2015NewLine        Application.Run();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UnhookWindowsHookEx(_hookID);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IntPtr SetHook(LowLevelKeyboardProc proc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Process curProcess = Process.GetCurrentProcess())Di2015NewLine        using (ProcessModule curModule = curProcess.MainModule)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return SetWindowsHookEx(WH_KEYBOARD_LL, proc, GetModuleHandle(curModule.ModuleName), 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ToggleCapsLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int KEYEVENTF_EXTENDEDKEY = 0x1;Di2015NewLine        const int KEYEVENTF_KEYUP = 0x2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UnhookWindowsHookEx(_hookID);Di2015NewLine        keybd_event(0x14, 0x45, KEYEVENTF_EXTENDEDKEY, (UIntPtr)0);Di2015NewLine        keybd_event(0x14, 0x45, KEYEVENTF_EXTENDEDKEY | KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, (UIntPtr)0);Di2015NewLine        _hookID = SetHook(_proc);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IntPtr HookCallback(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (nCode >= 0 && wParam == (IntPtr)WM_KEYDOWN)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lastKeyWasLetter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Control.IsKeyLocked(System.Windows.Forms.Keys.CapsLock))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ToggleCapsLock();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                lastKeyWasLetter = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Keys key = (Keys)Marshal.ReadInt32(lParam);            Di2015NewLine            if (key == Keys.Space)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!Control.IsKeyLocked(System.Windows.Forms.Keys.CapsLock))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ToggleCapsLock();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (key >= Keys.A && key <= Keys.Z)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastKeyWasLetter = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return CallNextHookEx(_hookID, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5853901Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class RandomUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GenerateRandomAlphaNumericString(int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string alpha = Di2015NewLine            "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return GenerateRandomString(length, alpha);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GenerateRandomString(int length, string alphabet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int maxlen = alphabet.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(alphabet[random.Next(0, maxlen)]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5855095Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<Foo>
5855095Di2015UniqueSeparatorHasBar
5855095Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Foo> selectedFoos =Di2015NewLine    sampleDataSetDi2015NewLine        .Distinct(new PerformantFooComparer())Di2015NewLine        .Where(f => f.HasBar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class PerformantFooComparer : IEqualityComparer<Foo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Foo x, Foo y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isXNull = x == null;Di2015NewLine        bool isYNull = y == null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return isXNull == isYNullDi2015NewLine            && isXNullDi2015NewLine            || (Di2015NewLine                x.Baz == y.BazDi2015NewLine                // && x.HasBar == y.HasBarDi2015NewLine                // HasBar commented out to avoid performance overhead.Di2015NewLine                // It is handled by a Where(foo => foo.HasBar) filterDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(Foo obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // See: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/263400/what-is-the-best-algorithm-for-an-overridden-system-object-gethashcodeDi2015NewLine        int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + obj.Baz.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        // HasBar intentionally not hashedDi2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5856081Di2015UniqueSeparatorAnother option is to use a special pattern to create a Boolean field recognized by the XmlSerializer, and to apply the XmlIgnoreAttribute to the field. The pattern is created in the form of propertyNameSpecified. For example, if there is a field named "MyFirstName" you would also create a field named "MyFirstNameSpecified" that instructs the XmlSerializer whether or not to generate the XML element named "MyFirstName".

5858304Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass StrategyExample {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Context context;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context = new Context(new SomeCondition());Di2015NewLine        context.executeStrategy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context = new Context(new SomeOtherCondition());Di2015NewLine        context.executeStrategy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The classes that implement a concrete strategy should implement this. The context class uses this to call the concrete strategyDi2015NewLineinterface Strategy {Di2015NewLine    void DoSomething(); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Implements the algorithm using the strategy interfaceDi2015NewLineclass SomeCondition implements Strategy {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoSomething() {Di2015NewLine        // some condition codeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Implements the algorithm using the strategy interfaceDi2015NewLineclass SomeOtherCondition implements Strategy {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoSomething() {Di2015NewLine        // dome other condition codeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Configured with a concrete strategy objectDi2015NewLineclass Context {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Strategy strategy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ConstructorDi2015NewLine    public Context(Strategy strategy) {Di2015NewLine        this.strategy = strategy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void executeStrategy() {Di2015NewLine        strategy.DoSomething();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5859285Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool AttemptToReConnectAccessPoint()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool wbRtn = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // attempt to connect to the proper networkDi2015NewLine    if (U.mapAccessPoint != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if we are currently on the right access point, we don't want to blow off the connectionDi2015NewLine        if (CheckIfAccessPointIsCurrent()) return true;Di2015NewLine        foreach (OpenNETCF.Net.Adapter wAdapter in OpenNETCF.Net.Networking.GetAdapters())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool wbFound = false;Di2015NewLine            foreach (OpenNETCF.Net.AccessPoint wAccessPoint in wAdapter.NearbyAccessPoints)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (wAccessPoint.Name == U.mapAccessPoint.Name)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    wbRtn = wAdapter.SetWirelessSettings(wAccessPoint.Name);Di2015NewLine                    // give the re-connect script a second to finishDi2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                    Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (wbFound) break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return wbRtn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5860537Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar solutions = from pair1 in listOneDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1)Di2015NewLine                from pair2 in listTwoDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1, pair2)Di2015NewLine                from pair3 in listThreeDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1, pair2, pair3)Di2015NewLine                from pair4 in listFourDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1, pair2, pair3, pair4)Di2015NewLine                from pair5 in listFiveDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1, pair2, pair3, pair4, pair5)Di2015NewLine                from pair6 in listSixDi2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(pair1, pair2, pair3, pair4, pair5, pair6)Di2015NewLine                from pair7 in listSevenDi2015NewLine                where IsSolution(pair1, pair2, pair3, pair4, pair5, pair6, pair7)Di2015NewLine                select new { pair1, pair2, pair3, pair4, pair5, pair6, pair7 };Di2015NewLine
5860537Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhere
5860537Di2015UniqueSeparatorIDictionary<MyEnum, int> CountOccurrences(IEnumerable<MyEnum> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (from e in values group e by e).ToDictionary(grp => grp.Key, grp => grp.Count());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar solutions = from p1 in CountOccurrences(listOne.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1)Di2015NewLine                from p2 in CountOccurrences(listTwo.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1, p2)Di2015NewLine                from p3 in CountOccurrences(listThree.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1, p2, p3)Di2015NewLine                from p4 in CountOccurrences(listFour.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1, p2, p3, p4)Di2015NewLine                from p5 in CountOccurrences(listFive.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5)Di2015NewLine                from p6 in CountOccurrences(listSix.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsCandidate(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6)Di2015NewLine                from p7 in CountOccurrences(listSeven.Values)Di2015NewLine                where IsSolution(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7)Di2015NewLine                select new {Di2015NewLine                    E1 = p1.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E2 = p2.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E3 = p3.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E4 = p4.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E5 = p5.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E6 = p6.Key,Di2015NewLine                    E7 = p7.Key,Di2015NewLine                    Times = p1.Value * p2.Value * p3.Value * p4.Value * p5.Value * p6.Value * p7.ValueDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine

5863733Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> divisors(int[] factors, List<int> foundfactors, int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(level > factors[0]) return foundfactors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int current = 1;Di2015NewLine    List<int> curpowers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<factors[2*level]+1; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        curpowers.Add(current);Di2015NewLine        current *= factors[2*level-1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    List<int> newfactors = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(int d in foundfactors)Di2015NewLine        foreach(int n in curpowers)Di2015NewLine            newfactors.Add(d*n);Di2015NewLine    return divisors(factors, newfactors, level + 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool ContainsInvalidCharacters(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // check if there is a non-digit characterDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in input)Di2015NewLine        if (!char.IsDigit(c))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool ContainsRepetitiveDigits(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (input.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the first characterDi2015NewLine    char firstChar = input[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if there is a different characterDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in input)Di2015NewLine        if (c != firstChar)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if not, it means it's repetitiveDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool StartsWithZero(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (input.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (input[0] == '0');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool IsSequence(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // we need at least two charactersDi2015NewLine    // for a sequenceDi2015NewLine    if (input.Length < 2)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the "delta" between first twoDi2015NewLine    // charactersDi2015NewLine    int difference = input[1] - input[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // allowed differences are:Di2015NewLine    //   -1: descending sequenceDi2015NewLine    //    0: repetitive digitsDi2015NewLine    //    1: ascending sequenceDi2015NewLine    if (difference < -1 || difference > 1)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if all characters are equallyDi2015NewLine    // distributedDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 2; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        if (input[i] - input[i - 1] != difference)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is a sequenceDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool Validate(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // list of all predicates to checkDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Predicate<string>> rules = new Predicate<string>[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContainsInvalidCharacters,Di2015NewLine        ContainsRepetitiveDigits,Di2015NewLine        StartsWithZero,Di2015NewLine        IsSequenceDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if any rule matchesDi2015NewLine    foreach (Predicate<string> check in rules)Di2015NewLine        if (check(input))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if no match, it means input is validDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsSequence
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorContainsRepetitiveDigits
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparator// (java code)Di2015NewLine/**Di2015NewLine * Defines a validation rule.Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic interface IValidationRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Returns a description of thisDi2015NewLine     * validation rule.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    String getDescription();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Returns true if this ruleDi2015NewLine     * is matched.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    boolean matches(String tpin);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorgetDescription
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatormatches
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparator// (java code)Di2015NewLinepublic class RepetitiveDigitsRule implements IValidationRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String getDescription()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "TPIN contains repetitive digits";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public boolean matches(String tpin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char firstChar = tpin.charAt(0);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < tpin.length(); i++)Di2015NewLine            if (tpin.charAt(i) != firstChar)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class StartsWithZeroRule implements IValidationRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String getDescription()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "TPIN starts with zero";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public boolean matches(String tpin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (tpin.length() < 1)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tpin.charAt(0) == '0';Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparatorIValidationRule
5866803Di2015UniqueSeparator// (java code)Di2015NewLinepublic class ValidatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // instantiate all known rulesDi2015NewLine    IValidationRule[] rules = new IValidationRule[] {Di2015NewLine        new RepetitiveDigitsRule(),Di2015NewLine        new StartsWithZeroRule()Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // validate tpin using all known rulesDi2015NewLine    public boolean validate(String tpin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.out.print("Validating TPIN " + tpin + "... ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // for all known rulesDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < rules.length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IValidationRule rule = rules[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if rule is matched?Di2015NewLine            if (rule.matches(tpin))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // print rule descriptionDi2015NewLine                System.out.println("Error: " + rule.getDescription());Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        System.out.println("Success.");Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5869419Di2015UniqueSeparatorTexture2D texture = ...;Di2015NewLineVector2 craterPosition = new Vector2(50,50);Di2015NewLinedouble maxDistance = Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow(texture.Width,2) + Math.Pow(texture.Height,2));Di2015NewLinefor(int x = 0; x < texture.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int y = 0; y < texture.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double distance = Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow(x - craterPosition.x, 2) + Math.Pow(y - craterPosition.y, 2));Di2015NewLine        //the lower distance is, the more intense the impact of the crater should beDi2015NewLine        //I don't know your color scheme, but let's assume that R=0.0f is the lowest point and R = 1.0f is the highestDi2015NewLine        distance /= maxDistance;Di2015NewLine        double height = (Math.Cos(distance * Math.Pi + Math.Pi) + 1.0) / 2.0;Di2015NewLine        texture[x,y] = new Color((float)height,0,0,1);        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5874554Di2015UniqueSeparator   static List<DirectoryEntry> OuInTheFormOf(DirectoryEntry deBase, string ou1, string ou2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      List<DirectoryEntry> deList = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /* Directory SearchDi2015NewLine       */Di2015NewLine      DirectorySearcher dsLookFor = new DirectorySearcher(deBase);Di2015NewLine      dsLookFor.Filter = ou1;Di2015NewLine      dsLookFor.SearchScope = SearchScope.Subtree;Di2015NewLine      dsLookFor.PropertiesToLoad.Add("ou");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      SearchResultCollection srcOUs = dsLookFor.FindAll();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (srcOUs.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        deList = new List<DirectoryEntry>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (SearchResult srOU in srcOUs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          DirectoryEntry deOU = srOU.GetDirectoryEntry();Di2015NewLine          if (deOU.Parent.Name.ToUpper() == ou2.ToUpper())Di2015NewLine            deList.Add(deOU);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return deList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5876460Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetCommonStart(string fp1, string fp2, string fp3)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int idx = 0;Di2015NewLine    int minLength = Math.Min(Math.Min(fp1.Length, fp2.Length), fp3.Length);Di2015NewLine    while (idx < minLength && fp1[idx] == fp2[idx] && fp2[idx] == fp3[idx])Di2015NewLine       idx++;Di2015NewLine    return fp1.Substring(0, idx);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

private AutoResetEvent _synchronizationEvent;Di2015NewLine    private bool _abortThreadToken;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public State()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _objects = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _synchronizationEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _abortThreadToken = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _synchronizeThread = new Thread(Synchronize);Di2015NewLine        _synchronizeThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Synchronize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!_abortThreadToken)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _synchronizationEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int objectsCacheCount;Di2015NewLine            lock (_cacheLocker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                objectsCacheCount = _objectsCache.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (objectsCacheCount > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _locker.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock (_cacheLocker)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _objects.AddRange(_objectsCache);Di2015NewLine                    _objectsCache.Clear();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _locker.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<object> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _locker.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var o in _objects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return o;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _locker.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Called by message handler threadDi2015NewLine    public void HandleMessage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_cacheLocker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _objectsCache.Add(new object());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _synchronizationEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _abortThreadToken = true;Di2015NewLine        _synchronizationEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5881045Di2015UniqueSeparatorLinkedList 500 insert/remove operations: 10171Di2015NewLineList 500 insert/remove operations: 968465Di2015NewLine
5881045Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int N = 1000*1000;Di2015NewLine        Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine        LinkedList<int> linkedList = new LinkedList<int>();Di2015NewLine        List<int> list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        List<LinkedListNode<int>> linkedListNodes = new List<LinkedListNode<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(r.Next());Di2015NewLine            LinkedListNode<int> linkedListNode = linkedList.AddFirst(r.Next());Di2015NewLine            if(r.Next() % 997 == 0)Di2015NewLine                linkedListNodes.Add(linkedListNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch stopwatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 500; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            linkedList.AddBefore(linkedListNodes[i], r.Next());Di2015NewLine            linkedList.Remove(linkedListNodes[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LinkedList 500 insert/remove operations: {0}", stopwatch.ElapsedTicks);Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 500; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Insert(r.Next(0,list.Count), r.Next());Di2015NewLine            list.RemoveAt(r.Next(0, list.Count));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("List 500 insert/remove operations: {0}", stopwatch.ElapsedTicks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5881355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SetPageParameter(this string url, int pageNumber)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queryStartIndex = url.IndexOf("?") + 1;Di2015NewLine    if (queryStartIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}?page={1}", url, pageNumber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var oldQueryString = url.Substring(queryStartIndex);Di2015NewLine    var queryParameters = HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(oldQueryString);Di2015NewLine    queryParameters["page"] = pageNumber;Di2015NewLine    return url.Substring(0, queryStartIndex) + queryParameters.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5886515Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Tuple<string, int>> GetEnumValuePairs(Type enumType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(!enumType.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Tuple<string, int>> result = new List<Tuple<string, int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var value in Enum.GetValues(enumType))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string fieldName = Enum.GetName(enumType, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo fieldInfo = enumType.GetField(fieldName);Di2015NewLine        var descAttribute = fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(false).Where(a => a is DescriptionAttribute).Cast<DescriptionAttribute>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ideally check if descAttribute is null hereDi2015NewLine        result.Add(Tuple.Create(descAttribute.Description, (int)value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5889836Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DataTable ToDataTable<T>(List<T> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = new DataTable(typeof (T).Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] props = typeof (T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo prop in props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = GetCoreType(prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = new object[props.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Type GetCoreType(Type t)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (t != null && IsNullable(t))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!t.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(t);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return t;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static bool IsNullable(Type t)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return !t.IsValueType || (t.IsGenericType && t.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5890900Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueue<Work> queue;Di2015NewLineAutoResetEvent outstandingWork = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Enqueue(Work work) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (queue)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine       queue.Enqueue(work); Di2015NewLine       outstandingWork.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWork DequeMaybe()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (queue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       if (queue.Count == 0) return null;Di2015NewLine       return queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid DoWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   while (true)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      Work work = DequeMaybe();Di2015NewLine      if (work == null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          outstandingWork.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine          continue;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      // Do the work.Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5891019Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Provides a base class for objects that support property change notification Di2015NewLine/// and querying for changes and resetting of the changed status.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class ViewModelBase : IChangeTracking, INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    //  ConstructorsDi2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    #region ViewModelBase()Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ViewModelBase"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected ViewModelBase()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.PropertyChanged += new PropertyChangedEventHandler(OnNotifiedOfPropertyChanged);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    //  Private MethodsDi2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    #region OnNotifiedOfPropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handles the <see cref="INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged"/> event for this object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The source of the event.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">A <see cref="PropertyChangedEventArgs"/> that contains the event data.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void OnNotifiedOfPropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e != null && !String.Equals(e.PropertyName, "IsChanged", StringComparison.Ordinal))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.IsChanged = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    //  IChangeTracking ImplementationDi2015NewLine    //========================================================Di2015NewLine    #region IsChangedDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the object's changed status.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <value>Di2015NewLine    /// <see langword="true"/> if the object’s content has changed since the last call to <see cref="AcceptChanges()"/>; otherwise, <see langword="false"/>. Di2015NewLine    /// The initial value is <see langword="false"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </value>Di2015NewLine    public bool IsChangedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_notifyingObjectIsChangedSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _notifyingObjectIsChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_notifyingObjectIsChangedSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if 5896719Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    string hexstr = FileToHexStr(path_to_file);Di2015NewLine    pictureBox1.Image = ConvertToBmp(hexstr, 200, 196, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string FileToHexStr(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string[] f = File.ReadAllLines(filename);Di2015NewLine    foreach (string s in f) sb.Append(s.Trim().Replace(" ", ""));Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate byte[] StringToByteArray(string hex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Enumerable.Range(0, hex.Length)Di2015NewLine                     .Where(x => x % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine                     .Select(x => System.Convert.ToByte(hex.Substring(x, 2), 16))Di2015NewLine                     .ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Bitmap ConvertToBmp(string hexstr, int width, int height, bool isGrayScaleString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// If hexstr is a color bitmap I assume that a single pixelDi2015NewLine    /// must be 3 values long (one for R, one for G, one for B);Di2015NewLine    /// if not, then every hex value is a pixelDi2015NewLine    int bpp = isGrayScaleString ? 1 : 3;Di2015NewLine    byte[] hexarr = StringToByteArray(hexstr);Di2015NewLine    // Check if string is correctDi2015NewLine    if (hexarr.Length != (width * height * bpp)) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < hexarr.Length; i +=  bpp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int luma = (int)(isGrayScaleString ?Di2015NewLine            hexarr[index] :Di2015NewLine            // Formula to convert from RGB to GrayscaleDi2015NewLine            // <see>http://www.bobpowell.net/grayscale.htm</see>Di2015NewLine            0.3 * hexarr[i] + 0.59 * hexarr[i + 1] + 0.11 * hexarr[i + 2]);Di2015NewLine        Color c = Color.FromArgb(luma, luma, luma);Di2015NewLine        bmp.SetPixel(index % width, index / width, c);Di2015NewLine        index++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
