ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static int GridSize = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<List<Point>> Positions = (from X in Enumerable.Range(0, GridSize)Di2015NewLine                                           from Y in          List<List<Point>> Result = new List<List<Point>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var Route in RoutesList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if and add this possible move to it.Di2015NewLine                List<Point> NextMoveRoot = new List<Point>(Route);Di2015NewLine                NextMoveRoot.Add(NextMove);Di2015NewLine                NextMoveRoutes.Add(NextMoveRoot);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return NextMoveRoutes;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static List<Point> List<Point>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 1, P.Y + 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 1, P.Y + 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 1, P.Y - 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 1, P.Y - 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 2, P.Y + 1));Di2015NewLine GridSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5897683Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static int GridSize = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Point>> Positions = from X in Enumerable.Range(0, GridSize)Di2015NewLine                                                        from Y in Enumerable.Range(0, GridSize)Di2015NewLine                                                        select new List<Point>() { new Point(X, Y) } as IEnumerable<Point>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var PossibleRoutes = WalkGraph(Positions, 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var Route in PossibleRoutes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(Route.Select(P => P.ToString()).Aggregate((curr, next) => curr + " " + next));Di2015NewLine                //Thread.Sleep(500); // Uncomment this to slow things down so you can read them!Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Point>> WalkGraph(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Point>> RoutesList, int DesiredLength)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var Route in RoutesList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Route.Count() < DesiredLength)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Extend the route (produces a list of routes) and recurseDi2015NewLine                    foreach (var ExtendedRoute in WalkGraph(ExtendRoute(Route), DesiredLength))Di2015NewLine                        yield return ExtendedRoute;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Result.Add(Route);Di2015NewLine                    yield return Route;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<Point>> ExtendRoute(IEnumerable<Point> Route)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Itterate through each possible moveDi2015NewLine            foreach (var NextMove in PossibleMoves(Route.Last()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a copy of the route, and add this possible move to it.Di2015NewLine                List<Point> NextMoveRoute = new List<Point>(Route);Di2015NewLine                NextMoveRoute.Add(NextMove);Di2015NewLine                yield return NextMoveRoute;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IEnumerable<Point> PossibleMoves(Point P)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Point> Result = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 1, P.Y + 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 1, P.Y + 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 1, P.Y - 2));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 1, P.Y - 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 2, P.Y + 1));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 2, P.Y + 1));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X + 2, P.Y - 1));Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(new Point(P.X - 2, P.Y - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Result.RemoveAll(PossibleMove => PossibleMove.X < 0 || PossibleMove.X > GridSize ||Di2015NewLine                                             PossibleMove.Y < 0 || PossibleMove.Y > GridSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Result as IEnumerable<Point>;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

for (int i=0; i<TESTITERATIONS; i++) // for benchmarking/regressionDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var output = TestOptimized(testcase);Di2015NewLine#if OUTPUTDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("spread\\t{0}", string.Join(", ", output));Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine#if VERIFYDi2015NewLine                    AssertValidOutput(output);Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine                } catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Error.WriteLine("Exception for input {0}:", string.Join(", ", testcase));Di2015NewLine                    Console.Error.WriteLine("Sequence length {0}: {1} groups and remainder {2}", testcase.Count(), (testcase.Count()+GROUPWIDTH-1)/GROUPWIDTH, testcase.Count() % GROUPWIDTH);Di2015NewLine                    Console.Error.WriteLine("Analysis: \\n\\t{0}", string.Join("\\n\\t", InternalAnalyzeInputRuns(testcase)));Di2015NewLine                    Console.Error.WriteLine(e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region Algorithm CoreDi2015NewLine    const int GROUPWIDTH = 3; /* implying a minimum distance of 2Di2015NewLine                                 (GROUPWIDTH-1) values in between duplicatesDi2015NewLine                                 must be guaranteed*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T[] TestOptimized<T>(T[] input, bool doShuffle = false)Di2015NewLine        where T: IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input.Length==0)Di2015NewLine            return input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var runs = InternalAnalyzeInputRuns(input);Di2015NewLine#if VERIFYDi2015NewLine        CanBeSatisfied(input.Length, runs); // throws NoValidOrderingExists if notDi2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        var transpositions = CreateTranspositionIndex(input.Length, runs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int run=0; run<runs.Length; run++)Di2015NewLine            for (int i=0; i<runs[run].runlength; i++)Di2015NewLine                input[transpositions[pos++]] = runs[run].value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return input;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ValueRun<T>[] InternalAnalyzeInputRuns<T>(T[] input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var listOfRuns = new List<ValueRun<T>>();Di2015NewLine        Array.Sort(input);Di2015NewLine        ValueRun<T> current = new ValueRun<T> { value = input[0], runlength = 1 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i=1; i<=input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i<input.Length && input[i].Equals(current.value))Di2015NewLine                current.runlength++;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                listOfRuns.Add(current);Di2015NewLine                if (i<input.Length)Di2015NewLine                    current = new ValueRun<T> { value = input[i], runlength = 1 };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if SIMPLERANDOMDi2015NewLine        var rng = new Random(_seeder.Next());Di2015NewLine        listOfRuns.ForEach(run => run.tag = rng.Next()); // this shuffles themDi2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        var runs = listOfRuns.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        Array.Sort(runs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return runs;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // NOTE: suboptimal performance Di2015NewLine    //   * some steps can be done inline with CreateTranspositionIndex forDi2015NewLine    //   efficiencyDi2015NewLine    private class NoValidOrderingExists : Exception { public NoValidOrderingExists(string message) : base(message) { } }Di2015NewLine    private static bool CanBeSatisfied<T>(int length, ValueRun<T>[] runs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int groups = (length+GROUPWIDTH-1)/GROUPWIDTH;Di2015NewLine        int remainder = length % GROUPWIDTH;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // elementary checksDi2015NewLine        if (length<GROUPWIDTH)Di2015NewLine            throw new NoValidOrderingExists(string.Format("Input sequence shorter ({0}) than single group of {1})", length, GROUPWIDTH));Di2015NewLine        if (runs.Length<GROUPWIDTH)Di2015NewLine            throw new NoValidOrderingExists(string.Format("Insufficient distinct values ({0}) in input sequence to fill a single group of {1})", runs.Length, GROUPWIDTH));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int effectivewidth = Math.Min(GROUPWIDTH, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check for a direct exhaustion by repeating a single value more than the available number of groups (for the relevant groupmember if there is a remainder group)Di2015NewLine        for (int groupmember=0; groupmember<effectivewidth; groupmember++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int capacity = remainder==0? groups : groups -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (capacity < runs[groupmember].runlength)Di2015NewLine                throw new NoValidOrderingExists(string.Format("Capacity exceeded on groupmember index {0} with capacity of {1} elements, (runlength {2} in run of '{3}'))",Di2015NewLine                            groupmember, capacity, runs[groupmember].runlength, runs[groupmember].value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // with the above, no single ValueRun should be a problem; however, dueDi2015NewLine        // to space exhaustion duplicates could end up being squeezed into theDi2015NewLine        // 'remainder' group, which could be an incomplete group; Di2015NewLine        // In particular, if the smallest ValueRun (tail) has a runlength>1Di2015NewLine        // _and_ there is an imcomplete remainder group, there is a problemDi2015NewLine        if (runs.Last().runlength>1 && (0!=remainder))Di2015NewLine            throw new NoValidOrderingExists("Smallest ValueRun would spill into trailing incomplete group");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // will also verify solvability of input sequenceDi2015NewLine    private static int[] CreateTranspositionIndex<T>(int length, ValueRun<T>[] runs)Di2015NewLine        where T: IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int remainder = length % GROUPWIDTH;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int effectivewidth = Math.Min(GROUPWIDTH, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var transpositions = new int[length];Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int outit = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int groupmember=0; groupmember<effectivewidth; groupmember++)Di2015NewLine                for (int pos=groupmember; outit<length && pos<(length-remainder) /* avoid the remainder */; pos+=GROUPWIDTH)Di2015NewLine                    transpositions[outit++] = pos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (outit<length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transpositions[outit] = outit;Di2015NewLine                outit += 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine            int groups = (length+GROUPWIDTH-1)/GROUPWIDTH;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Natural transpositions ({1} elements in {0} groups, remainder {2}): ", groups, length, remainder);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\t{0}", string.Join(" ", transpositions));Di2015NewLine            var sum1 = string.Join(":", Enumerable.Range(0, length));Di2015NewLine            var sum2 = string.Join(":", transpositions.OrderBy(i=>i));Di2015NewLine            if (sum1!=sum2)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("transpositions do not cover range\\n\\tsum1 = " + sum1 + "\\n\\tsum2 = " + sum2);Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return transpositions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregion // Algorithm CoreDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region UtilitiesDi2015NewLine    private struct ValueRun<T> : IComparable<ValueRun<T>>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public T value;Di2015NewLine        public int runlength;Di2015NewLine        public int tag;         // set to random for shufflingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CompareTo(ValueRun<T> other) { var res = other.runlength.CompareTo(runlength); return 0==res? tag.CompareTo(other.tag) : res; }Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString() { return string.Format("[{0}x {1}]", runlength, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static /*readonly*/ Random _seeder = new Random(45);Di2015NewLine#endregion // UtilitiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region Error detection/verificationDi2015NewLine    public static void AssertValidOutput<T>(IEnumerable<T> output)Di2015NewLine        where T:IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var repl = output.Concat(output.Take(GROUPWIDTH)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i=1; i<repl.Length; i++) Di2015NewLine            for (int j=Math.Max(0, i-(GROUPWIDTH-1)); j<i; j++)Di2015NewLine                if (repl[i].Equals(repl[j]))Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Improper duplicate distance found: (#{0};#{1}) out of {2}: value is '{3}'", j, i, output.Count(), repl[j]));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5900177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic new event EventHandler ClickDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    addDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Click += value;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Control control in Controls)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            control.Click += value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    removeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Click -= value;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Control control in Controls)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            control.Click -= value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5900192Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var input = new[] {Di2015NewLine        "\\"formatter\\": \\"John\\"", Di2015NewLine        "\\"formatter\\": \\"Sue\\"", Di2015NewLine        "\\"formatter\\": \\"Greg\\""Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var s in input) {Di2015NewLine        System.Console.Write("Original: [{0}]{1}", s, Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        System.Console.Write("Replaced: [{0}]{1}", ReFormat(s), Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String ReFormat(String str) {Di2015NewLine    //Use named capturing groups to make life easierDi2015NewLine    var pattern = "(?<label>\\"formatter\\"): ([\\"])(?<tag>.*)([\\"])";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a substitution pattern for the Replace methodDi2015NewLine    var replacePattern = "${label}: ${tag}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Regex.Replace(str, pattern, replacePattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5901002Di2015UniqueSeparator  class MainClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            //Constants from /usr/include/bits/dlfcn.hDi2015NewLine            private const int RTLD_LAZY = 0x00001; //Only resolve symbols as neededDi2015NewLine            private const int RTLD_GLOBAL = 0x00100; //Make symbols available to libraries loaded laterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [DllImport("dl")]Di2015NewLine            private static extern IntPtr dlopen (string file, int mode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [DllImport("a")]Di2015NewLine            private static extern void f ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static void Main (string[] args)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    //Load libb. RTLD_LAZY could be replaced with RTLD_NOW, butDi2015NewLine                    //RTLD_GLOBAL is essentialDi2015NewLine                    dlopen("libb.so", RTLD_LAZY|RTLD_GLOBAL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Call f(), no unresolved symbol problem!Di2015NewLine                    f();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5901201Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] data = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);Di2015NewLine// make data big-endian if neededDi2015NewLineif (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian) {Di2015NewLine   Array.Reverse(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// first 5 base-64 character always "A" (as first 30 bits always zero)Di2015NewLine// only need to keep the 6 characters (36 bits) at the end Di2015NewLinestring base64 = Convert.ToBase64String(data, 0, 8).Substring(5,6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data2 = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine// add back in all the characters removed during encodingDi2015NewLineConvert.FromBase64String("AAAAA" + base64 + "=").CopyTo(data2, 0);Di2015NewLine// reverse again from big to little-endianDi2015NewLineif (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian) {Di2015NewLine   Array.Reverse(data2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinelong decoded = BitConverter.ToInt64(data2, 0);Di2015NewLine

5901201Di2015UniqueSeparatorlg(10) * 10
5901201Di2015UniqueSeparator// This does not "pad" valuesDi2015NewLinestring Encode(long inp, IEnumerable<char> map) {Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(inp >= 0, "not implemented for negative numbers");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var b = map.Count();Di2015NewLine    // value -> characterDi2015NewLine    var toChar = map.Select((v, i) => new {Value = v, Index = i}).ToDictionary(i => i.Index, i => i.Value);Di2015NewLine    var res = "";Di2015NewLine    if (inp == 0) {Di2015NewLine      return "" + toChar[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (inp > 0) {Di2015NewLine      // encoded least-to-most significantDi2015NewLine      var val = (int)(inp % b);Di2015NewLine      inp = inp / b;Di2015NewLine      res += toChar[val];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelong Decode(string encoded, IEnumerable<char> map) {Di2015NewLine    var b = map.Count();Di2015NewLine    // character -> valueDi2015NewLine    var toVal = map.Select((v, i) => new {Value = v, Index = i}).ToDictionary(i => i.Value, i => i.Index);      Di2015NewLine    long res = 0;Di2015NewLine    // go in reverse to mirror encodingDi2015NewLine    for (var i = encoded.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine      var ch = encoded[i];Di2015NewLine      var val = toVal[ch];Di2015NewLine      res = (res * b) + val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // for a 48-bit base, omits l/L, 1, i/I, o/O, 0Di2015NewLine    var map = new char [] {Di2015NewLine        'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', 'J', 'K',Di2015NewLine        'M', 'N', 'P', 'Q', 'R', 'S', 'T', 'U', 'V', 'W',Di2015NewLine        'X', 'Y', 'Z', 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g',Di2015NewLine        'h', 'j', 'k', 'm', 'n', 'p', 'q', 'r', 's', 't',Di2015NewLine        'u', 'v', 'x', 'y', 'z', '2', '3', '4',Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    var test = new long[] {0, 1, 9999999999, 4294965286, 2292964213, 1000000000};Di2015NewLine    foreach (var t in test) {Di2015NewLine        var encoded = Encode(t, map);Di2015NewLine        var decoded = Decode(encoded, map);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Format("value: {0} encoded: {1}", t, encoded));Di2015NewLine        if (t != decoded) {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("failed for " + t);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5906037Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string GetResults(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Regex wordRegex = new Regex(@"\\W+");Di2015NewLine        var scores = Dictionaries.Select(n => newDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Language = n.Key,Di2015NewLine                Score = wordRegex.Split(text)Di2015NewLine                                 .Select(m => n.Value.getScore(m))Di2015NewLine                                 .Sum()Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int total = scores.Sum(n => n.Score);Di2015NewLine        return string.Join(" ",scores.Select(n => "[" + n.Score * 100 / total + "% " + n.Language + "]");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5906623Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void BeginReceive()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( _clientState == EClientState.Receiving)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_asyncTask.BytesReceived != 0 && _asyncTask.TotalBytesReceived <= _maxPageSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SocketAsyncEventArgs e = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLine            e.SetBuffer(_asyncTask.ReceiveBuffer, 0, _asyncTask.ReceiveBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            e.Completed += new EventHandler<SocketAsyncEventArgs>(ReceiveCallback);Di2015NewLine            e.UserToken = _asyncTask.Host;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool comletedAsync = false;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                comletedAsync = _socket.ReceiveAsync(e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SocketException se)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Error receiving data from: " + _asyncTask.Host);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("SocketException: {0} Error Code: {1}", se.Message, se.NativeErrorCode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ChangeState(EClientState.Failed);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!comletedAsync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The call completed synchronously so invoke the callback ourselvesDi2015NewLine                ReceiveCallback(this, e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("Num bytes received: " + _asyncTask.TotalBytesReceived);Di2015NewLine            ChangeState(EClientState.ReceiveDone);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5906623Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ReceiveCallback(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (_sync) // re-entrant lockDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Fast fail: should not be receiving data if the clientDi2015NewLine        // is not in a receiving state.Di2015NewLine        if (_clientState == EClientState.Receiving)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String host = (String)args.UserToken;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_asyncTask.Host == host && args.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Encoding encoding = Encoding.ASCII;Di2015NewLine                    _asyncTask.BytesReceived = args.BytesTransferred;Di2015NewLine                    _asyncTask.TotalBytesReceived += _asyncTask.BytesReceived;Di2015NewLine                    _asyncTask.DocSource += encoding.GetString(_asyncTask.ReceiveBuffer, 0, _asyncTask.BytesReceived);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    BeginReceive();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Error receiving data from: " + host);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("SocketException: {0} Error Code: {1}", e.Message, e.NativeErrorCode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ChangeState(EClientState.Failed);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (_asyncTask.Host != host)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Warning: received a callback for {0}, but the client is currently working on {1}.",Di2015NewLine                    host, _asyncTask.Host);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Socket Error: {0} when receiving from {1}",Di2015NewLine                   args.SocketError,Di2015NewLine                   _asyncTask.Host);Di2015NewLine                ChangeState(EClientState.Failed);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5911313Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class HandleErrorAttribute : FilterAttribute, IExceptionFilterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnException(ExceptionContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (filterContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("filterContext");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (filterContext.ExceptionHandled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var exception = filterContext.Exception;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // that need to be your current request object. In this case I use a custom one so I must fetch it from the items collection of the current request, where I had stored it before.Di2015NewLine        var request = filterContext.HttpContext.Items[Request.RequestKey] as Request;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (request != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // overwrite ErrorResponse with a response object of your choice or write directly to the filterContext.HttpContext.ResponseDi2015NewLine            var errorResponse = new ErrorResponse(request, exception); Di2015NewLine            errorResponse.Write(filterContext.HttpContext.Response);Di2015NewLine            filterContext.ExceptionHandled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Or a just slightly modified version of the default ASP.Net MVC HandleError AttributeDi2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method | AttributeTargets.Class, Inherited = true, AllowMultiple = true)]Di2015NewLine    public class CustomHandleErrorAttribute : FilterAttribute, IExceptionFilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // FieldsDi2015NewLine        private const string _defaultView = "Error";Di2015NewLine        private string _master;Di2015NewLine        private readonly object _typeId = new object();Di2015NewLine        private string _view;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // MethodsDi2015NewLine        public virtual void OnException(ExceptionContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (filterContext == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("filterContext");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!filterContext.IsChildAction && (!filterContext.ExceptionHandled && filterContext.HttpContext.IsCustomErrorEnabled))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Exception innerException = filterContext.Exception;Di2015NewLine                if ((new HttpException(null, innerException).GetHttpCode() == 500))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string 5913497Di2015UniqueSeparator//check if the line is a comment or xml commentDi2015NewLineif (Regex.IsMatch(lines[idx], @"^\\s*//")) Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//check if the entry is an attributeDi2015NewLineif (Regex.IsMatch(lines[idx], @"^\\s*\\["))Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//check if the line is part of a block comment (assuming a * at the start of the line)Di2015NewLineif (Regex.IsMatch(lines[idx], @"^\\s*(/\\*+|\\*+)"))Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//check if the line has been marked as ignored Di2015NewLine//(this is something handy I use to mark a string to be ignored for any reason, just put //IgnoreString at the end of the line)Di2015NewLineif (Regex.IsMatch(lines[idx], @"//\\s*IgnoreString\\s*$")) Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine

5913678Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing CSG.Games.Data.SqlRepository.Model;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CSG.Games.Data.SqlRepositoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Defines a transaction scopeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class TransactionScope :IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private int _contextUsageCounter; // the number of usages in the contextDi2015NewLine        private readonly object _contextLocker; // to make access to _context thread safeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool _disposed; // Indicates if the object is disposedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal TransactionScope()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Context = null;Di2015NewLine            _contextLocker = new object();Di2015NewLine            _contextUsageCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine            _disposed = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal MainDataContext Context { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal void Join()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // block the access to the contextDi2015NewLine            lock (_contextLocker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CheckDisposed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Increment the context usage counterDi2015NewLine                _contextUsageCounter++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If there is no context, create newDi2015NewLine                if (Context == null)Di2015NewLine                    Context = new MainDataContext();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal void Leave()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // block the access to the contextDi2015NewLine            lock (_contextLocker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CheckDisposed();Di2015NewLine                // If no one using the context, leave...Di2015NewLine                if(_contextUsageCounter == 0)Di2015NewLine                     return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Decrement the context usage counterDi2015NewLine                _contextUsageCounter--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the context is in use, leave...Di2015NewLine                if (_contextUsageCounter > 0)Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the context can be disposed, dispose itDi2015NewLine                if (Context.Transaction != null)Di2015NewLine                    Context.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Reset the context of this scope becuase the transaction scope endedDi2015NewLine                Context = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_contextLocker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_disposed) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (disposing)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Context != null && Context.Transaction != null)Di2015NewLine                        Context.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    _disposed = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CheckDisposed()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_disposed)Di2015NewLine                throw new ObjectDisposedException("The TransactionScope is disposed");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

5915268Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BoldedFirstLineToolTip : ToolTipDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public BoldedFirstLineToolTip()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.OwnerDraw = true;Di2015NewLine        this.Draw += new DrawToolTipEventHandler(OnDraw);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnDraw(object sender, DrawToolTipEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Try to draw using the visual style renderer.Di2015NewLine        if (VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported && VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined(VisualStyleElement.ToolTip.Standard.Normal))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bounds = e.Bounds;Di2015NewLine            var renderer = new VisualStyleRenderer(VisualStyleElement.ToolTip.Standard.Normal);Di2015NewLine            renderer.DrawBackground(e.Graphics, bounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var color = renderer.GetColor(ColorProperty.TextColor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var text = e.ToolTipText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var textBrush = new SolidBrush(renderer.GetColor(ColorProperty.TextColor)))Di2015NewLine            using (var font = e.Font)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Fix the positioning of the bounds for the text rectangle.Di2015NewLine                var rendererBounds = new Rectangle(e.Bounds.X + 6, e.Bounds.Y + 2, e.Bounds.Width - 6 * 2, e.Bounds.Height - 2 * 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!text.Contains('\\n'))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    renderer.DrawText(e.Graphics, rendererBounds, text);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var lines = text.Split('\\n').Select(l => l.Trim());Di2015NewLine                    var first = lines.First();Di2015NewLine                    var otherLines = Environment.NewLine + String.Join(Environment.NewLine, lines.Skip(1).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Draw the first line.Di2015NewLine                    using (var boldFont = new Font(font, FontStyle.Bold))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        e.Graphics.DrawString(first, boldFont, textBrush, rendererBounds.X - 1, rendererBounds.Y - 1);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    renderer.DrawText(e.Graphics, rendererBounds, otherLines, false /*drawDisabled*/, TextFormatFlags.Left);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Fall back to non-visual style drawing.Di2015NewLine            e.DrawBackground();Di2015NewLine            e.DrawBorder();Di2015NewLine            using (var sf = new StringFormat())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sf.LineAlignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawString(e.ToolTipText, SystemFonts.DialogFont, Brushes.Black, e.Bounds, sf);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5917015Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ConvertLeadingLowProbabilityColors(IList<ColorResult> colors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var leadingBelow60 = EnumerableDi2015NewLine        .Range(0, colors.Count)Di2015NewLine        .TakeWhile(index => colors[index].Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine    if (leadingBelow60.Count > 0 && leadingBelow60.Count < colors.Count - 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lastIndex = leadingBelow60.Last();Di2015NewLine        var firstNext = colors[lastIndex + 1];Di2015NewLine        var secondNext = colors[lastIndex + 2];Di2015NewLine        if (firstNext.Probability > 60 &&Di2015NewLine            secondNext.Probability > 60 &&Di2015NewLine            firstNext.Color == secondNext.Color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            leadingBelow60.ForEach(index => colors[index].Color = firstNext.Color);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Should_convert_trailing_low_probability_colors()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var colors = new List<ColorResult>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(1, "Unknown", 5f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(2, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(3, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(4, "Green", 40f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(5, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(6, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(7, "Red", 20f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(8, "Blue", 40f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(9, "Green", 5f)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ConvertTrailingLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var colorResult in colors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(colorResult.Index + " " + colorResult.Color);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colors[0].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Unknown");Di2015NewLine    colors[1].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[2].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[3].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Green");Di2015NewLine    colors[4].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[5].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[6].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[7].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[8].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ConvertTrailingLowProbabilityColors(IList<ColorResult> colors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var trailingBelow60 = EnumerableDi2015NewLine        .Range(0, colors.Count)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => colors.Count - 1 - i)Di2015NewLine        .TakeWhile(index => colors[index].Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine    if (trailingBelow60.Count > 0 && trailingBelow60.Count < colors.Count - 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lastIndex = trailingBelow60.Last();Di2015NewLine        var firstPrevious = colors[lastIndex - 1];Di2015NewLine        var secondPrevious = colors[lastIndex - 2];Di2015NewLine        if (firstPrevious.Probability > 60 &&Di2015NewLine            secondPrevious.Probability > 60 &&Di2015NewLine            firstPrevious.Color == secondPrevious.Color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            trailingBelow60.ForEach(index => colors[index].Color = firstPrevious.Color);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Should_convert_surrounded_low_probability_colors()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var colors = new List<ColorResult>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(1, "Unknown", 5f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(2, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(3, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(4, "Green", 40f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(5, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(6, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(7, "Red", 20f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(8, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(9, "Green", 5f)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ConvertSurroundedLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var colorResult in colors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(colorResult.Index + " " + colorResult.Color);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colors[0].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Unknown");Di2015NewLine    colors[1].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[2].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[3].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[4].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[5].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[6].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Red");Di2015NewLine    colors[7].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[8].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Green");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ConvertSurroundedLowProbabilityColors(IList<ColorResult> colors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var surrounding4Modification = new Surrounding4ModificationStrategy();Di2015NewLine    foreach (int index in EnumerableDi2015NewLine        .Range(0, colors.Count)Di2015NewLine        .Where(index => surrounding4Modification.IsMatch(colors, index)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        surrounding4Modification.Update(colors, index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Surrounding4ModificationStrategyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool IsMatch(IList<ColorResult> input, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (index < 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (index >= input.Count - 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (input[index].Probability >= 60)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var secondPrevious = input[index - 2];Di2015NewLine        if (secondPrevious.Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var firstPrevious = input[index - 1];Di2015NewLine        if (firstPrevious.Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var firstNext = input[index + 1];Di2015NewLine        if (firstNext.Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var secondNext = input[index + 2];Di2015NewLine        if (secondNext.Probability < 60)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (new[] { secondPrevious.Color, firstPrevious.Color, firstNext.Color, secondNext.Color }.Distinct().Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Update(IList<ColorResult> input, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        input[index].Color = input[index + 1].Color;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Should_convert_all_low_probability_colors()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var colors = new List<ColorResult>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(1, "Unknown", 5f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(2, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(3, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(4, "Green", 40f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(5, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(6, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(7, "Red", 20f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(8, "Blue", 80f),Di2015NewLine            new ColorResult(9, "Green", 5f)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ConvertLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var colorResult in colors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(colorResult.Index + " " + colorResult.Color);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colors[0].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[1].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[2].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[3].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[4].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[5].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[6].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Red");Di2015NewLine    colors[7].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Blue");Di2015NewLine    colors[8].Color.ShouldBeEqualTo("Green");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5917015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ConvertLowProbabilityColors(IList<ColorResult> colors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ConvertLeadingLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLine    ConvertSurroundedLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLine    ConvertTrailingLowProbabilityColors(colors);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5927925Di2015UniqueSeparator#if
5927925Di2015UniqueSeparatorAMD64
5927925Di2015UniqueSeparator    // unroll the loop Di2015NewLine#if AMD64 Di2015NewLine    // for AMD64 bit platform we unroll by 12 andDi2015NewLine    // check 3 qword at a time. This is less code Di2015NewLine    // than the 32 bit case and is shorter pathlengthDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (length >= 12) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (*(long*)a     != *(long*)b) break; Di2015NewLine        if (*(long*)(a+4) != *(long*)(b+4)) break; Di2015NewLine        if (*(long*)(a+8) != *(long*)(b+8)) break;Di2015NewLine        a += 12; b += 12; length -= 12; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine#elseDi2015NewLine    while (length >= 10)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        if (*(int*)a != *(int*)b) break;Di2015NewLine        if (*(int*)(a+2) != *(int*)(b+2)) break; Di2015NewLine        if (*(int*)(a+4) != *(int*)(b+4)) break; Di2015NewLine        if (*(int*)(a+6) != *(int*)(b+6)) break;Di2015NewLine        if (*(int*)(a+8) != *(int*)(b+8)) break; Di2015NewLine        a += 10; b += 10; length -= 10;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine

5931977Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Vector2> IntersectPixels(Di2015NewLine                    Matrix transformA, int widthA, int heightA, Color[] dataA,Di2015NewLine                    Matrix transformB, int widthB, int heightB, Color[] dataB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Calculate a matrix which transforms from A's local space intoDi2015NewLine    // world space and then into B's local spaceDi2015NewLine    Matrix transformAToB = transformA * Matrix.Invert(transformB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // When a point moves in A's local space, it moves in B's local space with aDi2015NewLine    // fixed direction and distance proportional to the movement in A.Di2015NewLine    // This algorithm steps through A one pixel at a time along A's X and Y axesDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the analogous steps in B:Di2015NewLine    Vector2 stepX = Vector2.TransformNormal(Vector2.UnitX, transformAToB);Di2015NewLine    Vector2 stepY = Vector2.TransformNormal(Vector2.UnitY, transformAToB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the top left corner of A in B's local spaceDi2015NewLine    // This variable will be reused to keep track of the start of each rowDi2015NewLine    Vector2 yPosInB = Vector2.Transform(Vector2.Zero, transformAToB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For each row of pixels in ADi2015NewLine    for(int yA = 0; yA < heightA; yA++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start at the beginning of the rowDi2015NewLine        Vector2 posInB = yPosInB;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // For each pixel in this rowDi2015NewLine        for(int xA = 0; xA < widthA; xA++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Round to the nearest pixelDi2015NewLine            int xB = (int)Math.Round(posInB.X);Di2015NewLine            int yB = (int)Math.Round(posInB.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the pixel lies within the bounds of BDi2015NewLine            if(0 <= xB && xB < widthB &&Di2015NewLine                0 <= yB && yB < heightB)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the colors of the overlapping pixelsDi2015NewLine                Color colorA = dataA[xA + yA * widthA];Di2015NewLine                Color colorB = dataB[xB + yB * widthB];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If both pixels are not completely transparent,Di2015NewLine                if(colorA.A != 0 && colorB.A != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // then an intersection has been foundDi2015NewLine                    yield return Vector2.Transform(new Vector2(xA, yA),transformA);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Move to the next pixel in the rowDi2015NewLine            posInB += stepX;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Move to the next rowDi2015NewLine        yPosInB += stepY;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // No intersection foundDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5931977Di2015UniqueSeparator//Contact points are cleared and re-added each updateDi2015NewLineList<Vector2> contactPoints = new List<Vector2>();Di2015NewLine//Texture for contact displayDi2015NewLineTexture2D pixelTex;Di2015NewLine
5931977Di2015UniqueSeparatorLoadContent()
5931977Di2015UniqueSeparatorpixelTex = new Texture2D(GraphicsDevice, 1, 1);Di2015NewLinepixelTex.SetData<Color>(new[] { Color.White });Di2015NewLine
5931977Di2015UniqueSeparatorUpdate()
5931977Di2015UniqueSeparator// Update each blockDi2015NewLinepersonHit = false;Di2015NewLinecontactPoints.Clear();Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 0; i < blocks.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Animate this block fallingDi2015NewLine    blocks[i].Position += new Vector2(0.0f, BlockFallSpeed);Di2015NewLine    blocks[i].Rotation += BlockRotateSpeed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Build the block's transformDi2015NewLine    Matrix blockTransform =Di2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateTranslation(new Vector3(-blockOrigin, 0.0f)) *Di2015NewLine        // Matrix.CreateScale(block.Scale) *  would go hereDi2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateRotationZ(blocks[i].Rotation) *Di2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateTranslation(new Vector3(blocks[i].Position, 0.0f));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the bounding rectangle of this block in world spaceDi2015NewLine    Rectangle blockRectangle = CalculateBoundingRectangle(Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(0, 0, blockTexture.Width, blockTexture.Height),Di2015NewLine                blockTransform);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The per-pixel check is expensive, so check the bounding rectanglesDi2015NewLine    // first to prevent testing pixels when collisions are impossible.Di2015NewLine    if(personRectangle.Intersects(blockRectangle))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        contactPoints.AddRange(IntersectPixels(personTransform, personTexture.Width,Di2015NewLine                            personTexture.Height, personTextureData,Di2015NewLine                            blockTransform, blockTexture.Width,Di2015NewLine                            blockTexture.Height, blockTextureData));Di2015NewLine        // Check collision with personDi2015NewLine        if(contactPoints.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            personHit = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove this block if it have fallen off the screenDi2015NewLine    if(blocks[i].Position.Y >Di2015NewLine        Window.ClientBounds.Height + blockOrigin.Length())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        blocks.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When removing a block, the next block will have the same indexDi2015NewLine        // as the current block. Decrement i to prevent skipping a block.Di2015NewLine        i--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebase.Update(gameTime);Di2015NewLine

5934688Di2015UniqueSeparator/* Implement IDisposable to cleanup connection */Di2015NewLinepublic class Connexion_D : IDisposable Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public SqlConnection conn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SqlConnection GetConnected()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String strConnectionString = ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["xxxxx"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine            conn = new SqlConnection(strConnectionString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception excThrown)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            conn = null;Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(excThrown.InnerException.Message, excThrown);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ouverture et restitution de la connexion en coursDi2015NewLine        if (conn.State == ConnectionState.Closed) conn.Open();Di2015NewLine        return conn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Boolean IsConnectedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (conn != null) && (conn.State != ConnectionState.Closed) && (conn.State != ConnectionState.Broken); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CloseConnection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Libération de la connexion si elle existeDi2015NewLine        if (IsConnected) { Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine            conn = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implement IDisposable.Di2015NewLine    // Do not make this method virtual.Di2015NewLine    // A derived class should not be able to override this method.Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Close connectionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

xlsxStream.CopyTo(resultFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void ProcessTemplate(Stream template, string replacementText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } // AutoSave enabledDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void DoReplace(IEnumerable<x.Text> textElements, string text.Text.Replace(placeHolder, replacementText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5937301Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<string> Split(string input, IEnumerable<string> delimiters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    List<int> indices = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get indices of delimitersDi2015NewLine    foreach (string s in delimiters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int idx = input.IndexOf(s);Di2015NewLine        if (idx >= 0)Di2015NewLine            indices.Add(idx);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    indices.Sort();Di2015NewLine    if (indices.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indices.Add(input.Length);Di2015NewLine        // split the stringDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < indices.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int idx = indices[i], nextIdx = indices[i + 1];Di2015NewLine            results.Add(input.Substring(idx, nextIdx - idx).Trim());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5939671Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PriceLevelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private decimal? bid = null;Di2015NewLine    private decimal? offer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public decimal? Bid {Di2015NewLine        get { return bid; }Di2015NewLine        set { bid = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public decimal? Offer {Di2015NewLine        get { return offer; }Di2015NewLine        set { offer = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void OnPriceChange(long instrumentId, Dictionary<decimal, PriceLevel> prices);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MainClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stack<String> xmlStack = new Stack<String>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<decimal, PriceLevel> prices = new Dictionary<decimal, PriceLevel>();Di2015NewLine    private bool isBids = false;Di2015NewLine    private decimal? currentPrice = null;Di2015NewLine    private long instrumentId;Di2015NewLine    private OnPriceChange _priceChangeCallback;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void MainClass(OnPriceChange priceChangeCallback) {Di2015NewLine        this._priceChangeCallback = priceChangeCallback;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void XmlStart(object source, MessageEventArgs args) {Di2015NewLine        xmlStack.Push(args.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!isBids && "bids" == args.Value) {Di2015NewLine            isBids = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void XmlEnd(object source, MessageEventArgs args) {Di2015NewLine        xmlStack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isBids && "bids" == args.Value) {Di2015NewLine            isBids = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finished parsing the orderBookEventDi2015NewLine        if ("orderBook" == args.Value) {Di2015NewLine            _priceChangeCallback(instrumentId, prices);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void XmlContent(object source, MessageEventArgs args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (xmlStack.Peek()) {Di2015NewLine        case "instrumentId":Di2015NewLine            instrumentId = long.Parse(args.Value);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "price":Di2015NewLine            currentPrice = decimal.Parse(args.Value);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "quantity":Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentPrice != null) {Di2015NewLine                decimal quantity = decimal.Parse(args.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (prices.ContainsKey(currentPrice)) {Di2015NewLine                    prices[currentPrice] = new PriceLevel();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                PriceLevel priceLevel = prices[currentPrice];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (isBids) {Di2015NewLine                    priceLevel.Bid = quantity;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    priceLevel.Offer = quantity;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

metadata.PropertyName ?? htmlFieldName.Split('.').Last();Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(labelText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return MvcHtmlString.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(labelText);Di2015NewLine            if (metadata.IsRequired)Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("*");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tag = new TagBuilder("label");Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(id))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tag.Attributes.Add("id", id);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (generatedId)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tag.Attributes.Add("id", html.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldId(htmlFieldName) + "_Label");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tag.Attributes.Add("for", html.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldId(htmlFieldName));Di2015NewLine            tag.SetInnerText(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return MvcHtmlString.Create(tag.ToString(TagRenderMode.Normal));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5940774Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MimeFormatElement: ConfigurationElementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Predefines the valid properties and preparesDi2015NewLine    /// the property collection.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    static MimeFormatElement()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Predefine properties hereDi2015NewLine        _mimeFormat = new ConfigurationProperty(Di2015NewLine            "mimeFormat",Di2015NewLine            typeof(MimeFormat),Di2015NewLine            "*/*",Di2015NewLine            ConfigurationPropertyOptions.IsRequiredDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _properties = new ConfigurationPropertyCollection {Di2015NewLine            _mimeFormat, _enabledDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static ConfigurationProperty _mimeFormat;Di2015NewLine    private static ConfigurationPropertyCollection _properties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty("mimeFormat", IsRequired = true)]Di2015NewLine    public MimeFormat MimeFormatDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (MimeFormat)base[_mimeFormat]; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*******************************************/Di2015NewLine[TypeConverter(typeof(MimeFormatConverter))]Di2015NewLine/*******************************************/Di2015NewLinepublic class MimeFormatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string FormatDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Type + "/" + SubType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Type;Di2015NewLine    public string SubType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MimeFormat(string mimeFormatStr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parts = mimeFormatStr.Split('/');Di2015NewLine        if (parts.Length != 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid MimeFormat");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type = parts[0];Di2015NewLine        SubType = parts[1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MimeFormatConverter : TypeConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvertFrom(ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sourceType == typeof(string);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override object ConvertFrom(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MimeFormat((string)value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return destinationType == typeof(string);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override object ConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var val = (MimeFormat)value;Di2015NewLine        return val.Type + "/" + val.SubType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5941117Di2015UniqueSeparator    private class Generic<T> { Di2015NewLine        public void Method() { }Di2015NewLine        public void Method(string param) { }Di2015NewLine        public void OtherMethod() { }  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class NonGeneric { public void Method() { } }Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var x = typeof(Generic<int>).GetMethod("Method", new Type[]{});Di2015NewLine        var y = typeof(Generic<double>).GetMethod("Method", new Type[]{});Di2015NewLine        var a = typeof(Generic<double>).GetMethod("OtherMethod");Di2015NewLine        var b = typeof(NonGeneric).GetMethod("Method");Di2015NewLine        var c = typeof(Generic<int>).GetMethod("Method", new Type[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(DeclaredInSameClass(x, y));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!DeclaredInSameClass(x, a));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!DeclaredInSameClass(x, b));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!DeclaredInSameClass(x, c));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!DeclaredInSameClass(a, b));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool DeclaredInSameClass(MethodInfo a, MethodInfo b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a.DeclaringType.IsGenericType != b.DeclaringType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (a.DeclaringType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var x = a.DeclaringType.GetGenericTypeDefinition().GetMethod(a.Name, a.GetParameters().Select(p => p.ParameterType).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            var y = b.DeclaringType.GetGenericTypeDefinition().GetMethod(b.Name, b.GetParameters().Select(p => p.ParameterType).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            return x.Equals(y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return a.GetBaseDefinition().Equals(b.GetBaseDefinition());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5941873Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<SecPkgInfo> Call_EnumerateSecurityPackages()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Will hold the number of security packages foundDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            //Create a copy of our pointer so that we can clear it laterDi2015NewLine            IntPtr ArrayPtr = new IntPtr(SourcePoint.ToInt32());Di2015NewLine            //The type of our structureDi2015NewLine            Type T = typeof(SecPkgInfo);Di2015NewLine            //The size of our structureDi2015NewLine            int ObjSize = Marshal.SizeOf(T);Di2015NewLine T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Increment our pointer by the size of the structureDi2015NewLine                ArrayPtr = IntPtr.Add(ArrayPtr, ObjSize);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Cleanup our pointerDi2015NewLine            MSG = FreeContextBuffer(ref SourcePoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Make sure cleanup workedDi2015NewLine            if (MSG == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Return our valuesDi2015NewLine                return SecPackages;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Do something better with the error code hereDi2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("Error cleaning up pointer");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Do something better with the error code hereDi2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Error calling native function");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 5944014Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CoreConfigurationSection : ConfigurationSectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty("settings", IsDefaultCollection = true)]Di2015NewLine    [ConfigurationCollection(typeof(CoreSettingCollection), AddItemName = "setting")]Di2015NewLine    public CoreSettingCollection SettingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (CoreSettingCollection)base["settings"];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CoreSetting : ConfigurationElementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public CoreSetting() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CoreSetting(string name, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Name = name;Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty("name", IsRequired = true, IsKey = true)]Di2015NewLine    public string NameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)this["name"]; }Di2015NewLine        set { this["name"] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ConfigurationProperty("value", DefaultValue = null, IsRequired = true, IsKey = false)]Di2015NewLine    public string ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string)this["value"]; }Di2015NewLine        set { this["value"] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CoreSettingCollection : ConfigurationElementCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public new string this[string name]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return BaseGet(name) == null ? 5944014Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SettingsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static string _root { get { return "core"; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Configuration Load()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string filename = Path.Combine(Core.BaseDirectory, "core.config");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mapping = new ExeConfigurationFileMap {ExeConfigFilename = filename};Di2015NewLine        var config = ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration(mapping, ConfigurationUserLevel.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var section = (CoreConfigurationSection)config.GetSection(_root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (section == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Core: Building core.config...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            section = new CoreConfigurationSection();Di2015NewLine            config.Sections.Add(_root, section);Di2015NewLine            Defaults(section);Di2015NewLine            config.Save(ConfigurationSaveMode.Modified);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 5944704Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the indexed entry.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="entry">The log entry.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The log entry prefixed with the index.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate string GetIndexedEntry(string entry)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string keyword = GetKeyword(entry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (keyword)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "books":Di2015NewLine            entry = "1 : " + entry;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "resources":Di2015NewLine            entry = "2 : " + entry;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Alternative code (using dictionary)Di2015NewLine    // entry = keywordIndexDictionary[keyword] + " : " + entry;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return entry;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the keyword.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="entry">The log entry.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The keyword for the specified log entry.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate string GetKeyword(string entry)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = entry.IndexOf("\\"GET");Di2015NewLine    entry = entry.Substring(index + ("\\"GET").Length);Di2015NewLine    index = 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5945866Di2015UniqueSeparatorShapeChecker
5945866Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Open your imageDi2015NewLine    string path = "test.png";Di2015NewLine    Bitmap image = (Bitmap)Bitmap.FromFile(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // locating objectsDi2015NewLine    BlobCounter blobCounter = new BlobCounter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    blobCounter.FilterBlobs = true;Di2015NewLine    blobCounter.MinHeight = 5;Di2015NewLine    blobCounter.MinWidth = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    blobCounter.ProcessImage(image);Di2015NewLine    Blob[] blobs = blobCounter.GetObjectsInformation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check for rectanglesDi2015NewLine    SimpleShapeChecker shapeChecker = new SimpleShapeChecker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var blob in blobs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<IntPoint> edgePoints = blobCounter.GetBlobsEdgePoints(blob);Di2015NewLine        List<IntPoint> cornerPoints;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use the shape checker to extract the corner pointsDi2015NewLine        if (shapeChecker.IsQuadrilateral(edgePoints, out cornerPoints))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // only do things if the corners form a rectangleDi2015NewLine            if (shapeChecker.CheckPolygonSubType(cornerPoints) == PolygonSubType.Rectangle)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // here i use the graphics class to draw an overlay, but youDi2015NewLine                // could also just use the cornerPoints list to calculate yourDi2015NewLine                // x, y, width, height values.Di2015NewLine                List<Point> Points = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var point in cornerPoints)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Points.Add(new Point(point.X, point.Y));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(image);Di2015NewLine                g.DrawPolygon(new Pen(Color.Red, 5.0f), Points.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                image.Save("result.png");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5946327Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Xml; // System.Xml.dllDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineXmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLinedoc.LoadXml(xml); // Load(file)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar ns = new XmlNamespaceManager(doc.NameTable);Di2015NewLinens.AddNamespace("tcm", "http://www.tridion.com/ContentManager/5.0");Di2015NewLinens.AddNamespace("xlink", "http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (XmlNode node in doc.SelectNodes("//*[local-name()=\\"Key\\"]"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    keysList.Add(node.InnerText);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineforeach (XmlNode node in doc.SelectNodes("//*[local-name()=\\"Value\\"]"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    valuesList.Add(node.InnerText);Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

GetAppSetting(String key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetConfigurationValue(ConfigurationSection.AppSettings, key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static String GetConfigurationValue(ConfigurationSection section, String key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Configurations config = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if 5958519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InterfaceContractResolver : DefaultContractResolver, IContractResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public InterfaceContractResolver() : this(false) { }Di2015NewLine    public InterfaceContractResolver(bool shareCache) : base (shareCache) {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override JsonProperty CreateProperty(MemberInfo member, MemberSerialization memberSerialization)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = base.CreateProperty(member, memberSerialization);Di2015NewLine        var interfaces = member.DeclaringType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var @interface in interfaces)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var interfaceProperty in @interface.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This is weak: among other things, an implementation Di2015NewLine                // may be deliberately hiding an interface memberDi2015NewLine                if (interfaceProperty.Name == member.Name && interfaceProperty.MemberType == member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (interfaceProperty.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(JsonPropertyAttribute), true).Any())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        property.Ignored = false;Di2015NewLine                        return property;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5958703Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<Func<T, bool>> AnyColumnContains<T> (string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var p = Expression.Parameter (typeof (T), "entity");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var fieldAccessors = typeof (T)Di2015NewLine        .GetFields()Di2015NewLine        .Where (f => f.FieldType == typeof (string))Di2015NewLine        .Select (f => Expression.Field (p, f))Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var fieldArray = Expression.NewArrayInit (typeof (string), fieldAccessors); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var concatCall = Expression.Call (typeof (string).GetMethod (Di2015NewLine        "Concat", new[] { typeof (string[]) }), fieldArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var contains = Expression.Call (Di2015NewLine        concatCall, Di2015NewLine        typeof (string).GetMethod ("Contains", new[] { typeof (string) } ),Di2015NewLine        Expression.Constant (value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>> (contains, p);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5960010Di2015UniqueSeparatorl.Sort(delegate(String One, String Two)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (One != "" && Two != "")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (One == Two)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add one more group to capture what remains of the expressionDi2015NewLine        Match l_mOne = Regex.Match(One, @"_*(\\D*)(\\d*)(.*)$"); Di2015NewLine        Match l_mTwo = Regex.Match(Two, @"_*(\\D*)(\\d*)(.*)$");Di2015NewLine        int Result;Di2015NewLine        if (l_mOne.Success || l_mTwo.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String l_strX, l_strY;Di2015NewLine            l_strX = l_mOne.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            l_strY = l_mTwo.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            Result = l_strX.CompareTo(l_strY);Di2015NewLine            if (Result != 0)Di2015NewLine                return Result;Di2015NewLine            l_strX = l_mOne.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine            l_strY = l_mTwo.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine            if (l_strX == String.Empty || l_strY == String.Empty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Result = l_strX.CompareTo(l_strY);Di2015NewLine                if (Result != 0)Di2015NewLine                    return Result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                long X = long.Parse(l_strX);Di2015NewLine                long Y = long.Parse(l_strY);Di2015NewLine                Result = X.CompareTo(Y);Di2015NewLine                if (Result != 0)Di2015NewLine                    return Result;Di2015NewLine                One = l_mOne.Groups[3].Value; //Store in 'One' the remaining part of the regexDi2015NewLine                Two = l_mTwo.Groups[3].Value; //The same in TwoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                continue; //The result will be the result of the comparison of those two new values.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return One.CompareTo(Two);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine
