5960058Di2015UniqueSeparator// Awful name, obviously.Di2015NewLinepublic static string TakeSkipTakeEtc(this string source, params char[] tokens)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool taking = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (char token in tokens)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = source.IndexOf(token, startIndex);Di2015NewLine        if (index == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (taking)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stringBuilder.Append(source.Substring(startIndex));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return stringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (taking)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int length = index + 1 - startIndex;Di2015NewLine            stringBuilder.Append(source.Substring(startIndex, length));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        startIndex = index + 1;Di2015NewLine        taking = !taking;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return stringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5961463Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <algorithm>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetemplate <class IndexContainer, class DataContainer>Di2015NewLinevoid arg_qsort(IndexContainer& indices,Di2015NewLine               const DataContainer& data,Di2015NewLine               int left,Di2015NewLine               int right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int i = left;Di2015NewLine  int j = right;Di2015NewLine  int pivot = left + (right - left) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (i <= j)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    while (data[indices[i]] < data[indices[pivot]])Di2015NewLine      ++i;Di2015NewLine    while (data[indices[j]] > data[indices[pivot]])Di2015NewLine      --j;Di2015NewLine    if (i <= j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      std::swap(indices[i], indices[j]);Di2015NewLine      ++i;Di2015NewLine      --j;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (left < j)Di2015NewLine    arg_qsort(indices, data, left, j);Di2015NewLine  if (i < right)Di2015NewLine    arg_qsort(indices, data, i, right);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine///Di2015NewLine/// Compute the indices that would sort the given data.Di2015NewLine///Di2015NewLinetemplate <class IndexContainer, class DataContainer>Di2015NewLinevoid argsort(IndexContainer& indices, const DataContainer& data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int size = indices.size();Di2015NewLine  if (size == 0)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    indices[i] = i;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  arg_qsort(indices, data, 0, size - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5965992Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Process pDocked;Di2015NewLineprivate IntPtr hWndOriginalParent;Di2015NewLineprivate IntPtr hWndDocked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern IntPtr SetParent(IntPtr hWndChild, IntPtr hWndNewParent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern bool MoveWindow(IntPtr hWnd, int X, int Y, int nWidth, int nHeight, bool bRepaint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dockIt()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (hWndDocked != IntPtr.Zero) //don't do anything if there's already a window docked.Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    hWndParent = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pDocked = Process.Start(@"notepad");Di2015NewLine    while (hWndDocked == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pDocked.WaitForInputIdle(1000); //wait for the window to be ready for input;Di2015NewLine        pDocked.Refresh();              //update process infoDi2015NewLine        if (pDocked.HasExited)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return; //abort if the process finished before we got a handle.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        hWndDocked = pDocked.MainWindowHandle;  //cache the window handleDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Windows API call to change the parent of the target window.Di2015NewLine    //It returns the hWnd of the window's parent prior to this call.Di2015NewLine    hWndOriginalParent = SetParent(hWndDocked, Panel1.Handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Wire up the event to keep the window sized to match the controlDi2015NewLine    Panel1.SizeChanged += new EventHandler(Panel1_Resize);Di2015NewLine    //Perform an initial call to set the size.Di2015NewLine    Panel1_Resize(new Object(), new EventArgs());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void undockIt()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Restores the application to it's original parent.Di2015NewLine    SetParent(hWndDocked, hWndOriginalParent);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Panel1_Resize(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Change the docked windows size to match its parent's size. Di2015NewLine    MoveWindow(hWndDocked, 0, 0, Panel1.Width, Panel1.Height, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5969090Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Note> ApplyCascades(this IEnumerable<Note> notes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var uniques = new HashSet<Note>();Di2015NewLine        Note rightToYield = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var n in notes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool leftYielded = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (n.Cascade == Cascade.All) yield return n;Di2015NewLine            if (n.Cascade == Cascade.Left && !leftYielded)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return n;Di2015NewLine                leftYielded = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (n.Cascade == Cascade.Right)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rightToYield = n;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (n.Cascade == Cascade.Unique && !uniques.Contains(n))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return n;Di2015NewLine                uniques.Add(n);Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (rightToYield != null) yield return rightToYield;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5969090Di2015UniqueSeparator    List<Note> Composite(IList<IList<Note>> notes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = from list in notesDi2015NewLine                     from note in list.ApplyCascades()Di2015NewLine                     select note;Di2015NewLine        return result.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5971583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool isValid(string inputString, string checkString, Operator operation)     Di2015NewLine        {         Di2015NewLine            double dblTmp1;Di2015NewLine            double dblTmp2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Double.TryParse(inputString, out dblTmp1) && double.TryParse(checkString, out dblTmp2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Compare<Double>(dblTmp1, dblTmp1, operation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DateTime dtTmp1;Di2015NewLine            DateTime dtTmp2;Di2015NewLine            if (DateTime.TryParse(inputString, out dtTmp1) && DateTime.TryParse(checkString, out dtTmp2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Compare<DateTime>(dtTmp1, dtTmp2, operation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Unknown type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool Compare<T>(T obj1, T obj2, Operator operation) where T : IComparable      Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (operation)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Operator.EQUAL:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return obj1.Equals(obj2);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                case Operator.GREATER_THAN:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return obj1.CompareTo(obj2) > 0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new InvalidOperationException("Unknown operation");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5982544Di2015UniqueSeparator// will contain all contiguous subsets Di2015NewLinevar sequences = new List<Tuple<bool, List<int>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// build subsets Di2015NewLineforeach (int item in source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var deadCopies = new List<Tuple<bool, List<int>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var record in sequences.Where(r => r.Item1 && !r.Item2.Contains(0)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // make a copy that is "dead"Di2015NewLine        var deadCopy = new Tuple<bool, List<int>>(false, record.Item2.ToList());Di2015NewLine        deadCopies.Add(deadCopy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        record.Item2.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sequences.Add(new Tuple<bool, List<int>>(true, new List<int> { item }));Di2015NewLine    sequences.AddRange(deadCopies);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5982544Di2015UniqueSeparator// find subset with highest product Di2015NewLineint maxProduct = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLineIEnumerable<int> maxSequence = Enumerable.Empty<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var record in sequences)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int product = record.Item2.Aggregate((a, b) => a * b);Di2015NewLine    if (product > maxProduct)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        maxProduct = product;Di2015NewLine        maxSequence = record.Item2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5983352Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ICommand SelectAllCheckedCommand { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineprivate void OnSelectAllCheckedCommand(object arg )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   if (arg == null || !(arg is NameValueConverterResult)) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   NameValueConverterResult prop = arg as NameValueConverterResult;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Reflect on the model to find the property we want to update.Di2015NewLine   PropertyInfo propInfo = Averagers.FirstOrDefault().GetType().GetProperty(prop.Name);Di2015NewLine   if (propInfo == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Set the property on the ModelDi2015NewLine   foreach (var item in Averagers)Di2015NewLine      propInfo.SetValue(item, prop.Value, null);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

return; }Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(tbB.Text)) { CentToInch(); return; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void FtoC()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             tbB.Text = Convert.ToString((Convert.ToDouble(tbA.Text) * 9 / 5) + 32);             Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CentToInch()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tbA.Text = Convert.ToString(Convert.ToDouble(tbB.Text) * 0.3937008); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5984170Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct WaveFormatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private short m_FormatTag;       // most often PCM = 1      Di2015NewLine    private short m_nChannels;       // number of channels      Di2015NewLine    private int m_SamplesPerSecond;  // samples per second eg 44100     Di2015NewLine    private int m_AvgBytesPerSecond; // bytes per second eg 176000      Di2015NewLine    private short m_BlockAlign;      // blockalign (byte per sample) eg 4 bytes         Di2015NewLine    private short m_BitsPerSample;   // bits per sample, 8, 16, 24Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WaveFormat(byte BPS, int SPS, byte nChn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_FormatTag = 1; //PCMDi2015NewLine        m_nChannels = nChn;Di2015NewLine        m_SamplesPerSecond = SPS;Di2015NewLine        m_BitsPerSample = BPS;Di2015NewLine        m_BlockAlign = (short)(m_nChannels * m_BitsPerSample / 8);Di2015NewLine        m_AvgBytesPerSecond = (int)(m_BlockAlign * m_SamplesPerSecond);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public short FormatTagDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_FormatTag; }Di2015NewLine        set { m_FormatTag = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public short ChannelsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_nChannels; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int SamplesPerSecondDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_SamplesPerSecond; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int AvgBytesPerSecondDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_AvgBytesPerSecond; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public short BlockAlignDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_BlockAlign; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public short BitsPerSampleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_BitsPerSample; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Read(BinaryReader br)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_FormatTag = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine        m_nChannels = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine        m_SamplesPerSecond = br.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine        m_AvgBytesPerSecond = br.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine        m_BlockAlign = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine        m_BitsPerSample = br.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Write(BinaryWriter bw)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_FormatTag);Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_nChannels);Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_SamplesPerSecond);Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_AvgBytesPerSecond);Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_BlockAlign);Di2015NewLine        bw.Write(m_BitsPerSample);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("FormatTag:         " + m_FormatTag.ToString());Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("nChannels:         " + m_nChannels.ToString());Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("SamplesPerSecond:  " + m_SamplesPerSecond.ToString());Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("AvgBytesPerSecond: " + m_AvgBytesPerSecond.ToString());Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("BlockAlign:        " + m_BlockAlign.ToString());Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("BitsPerSample:     " + m_BitsPerSample.ToString());Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5986414Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLinenamespace _5893408Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine            var futureTime = DateTime.Now.AddSeconds(60);Di2015NewLine            while (DateTime.Now < futureTime)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(GetNextNumber(rand));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int GetNextNumber(Random rand)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            string filePath = @"C:\\num.txt";Di2015NewLine            FileStream fileStream = null;Di2015NewLine            while (fileStream == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                try { fileStream = File.Open(filePath, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None); }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            using (fileStream)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DateTime date;Di2015NewLine                int prevNum;Di2015NewLine                if (fileStream.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    date = now;Di2015NewLine                    prevNum = rand.Next(100000, 999999);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var reader = new StreamReader(fileStream);Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        date = DateTime.Parse(reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                        prevNum = int.Parse(reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (date.DayOfYear != now.DayOfYear)Di2015NewLine                        prevNum = rand.Next(100000, 999999);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                int nextNum = prevNum + rand.Next(10, 1000);Di2015NewLine                fileStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                using (var writer = new StreamWriter(fileStream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(now);Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(nextNum);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return nextNum;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5986436Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Removes a given value from the values associated with a key. If theDi2015NewLine        /// last value is removed from a key, the key is removed also.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key">A key to remove a value from.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="value">The value to remove.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if <paramref name="value"/> was associated with <paramref name="key"/> (and wasDi2015NewLine        /// therefore removed). False if <paramref name="value"/> was not associated with <paramref name="key"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public sealed override bool Remove(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            KeyAndValues keyValues = new KeyAndValues(key);Di2015NewLine            KeyAndValues existing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (hash.Find(keyValues, false, out existing)) {Di2015NewLine                // There is an item in the hash table equal to this key. Find the value.Di2015NewLine                int existingCount = existing.Count;Di2015NewLine                int valueHash = Util.GetHashCode(value, valueEqualityComparer);Di2015NewLine                int indexFound = -1;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < existingCount; ++i) {Di2015NewLine                    if (Util.GetHashCode(existing.Values[i], valueEqualityComparer) == valueHash &&Di2015NewLine                        valueEqualityComparer.Equals(existing.Values[i], value)) Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Found an equal existing valueDi2015NewLine                        indexFound = i;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (existingCount == 1) {Di2015NewLine                    // Removing the last value. Remove the key.Di2015NewLine                    hash.Delete(existing, out keyValues);Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine
5986436Di2015UniqueSeparatorexistingCount == 1
5986436Di2015UniqueSeparatorhash.Delete
5986436Di2015UniqueSeparator            if (existingCount == 1 && indexFound != -1) {Di2015NewLine                // Removing the last value. Remove the key.Di2015NewLine                hash.Delete(existing, out keyValues);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

5989608Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly Dictionary<WaitHandle, Action> actions = new Dictionary<WaitHandle, Action>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<WaitHandle> handles = new List<WaitHandle>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<WaitHandle> triggeredHandles = new List<WaitHandle>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// thread 1Di2015NewLine    public void CheckLoop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WaitHandle[] waitHandles = handles.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            int index = WaitHandle.WaitAny(waitHandles);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (index >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (triggeredHandles)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                   triggeredHandles.Add(waitHandles[index]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }            Di2015NewLine        } while (true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// thread 2Di2015NewLinepublic void RunLoop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock(triggeredHandles)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var th in triggeredHandles) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                   Action action;Di2015NewLine                   lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       action = actions[th];Di2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                   action();                   Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                triggeredHandles.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine        } while (true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5989684Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = Enumerable.Range(1, 9)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => new { V = i, P = i })Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    list.Dump("list");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sum =Di2015NewLine        (from element in listDi2015NewLine         select element.P).Sum();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, int> selected = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var value in Enumerable.Range(0, sum))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var temp = value;Di2015NewLine        var v = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (temp < element.P)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                v = element.V;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            temp -= element.P;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(v > 0);Di2015NewLine        if (!selected.ContainsKey(v))Di2015NewLine            selected[v] = 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            selected[v] += 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    selected.Dump("how many times was each value selected?");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5990808Di2015UniqueSeparatorISynchronizeInvoke
5990808Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Fires an event and catches any exceptions raised by an event handler.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ev">The event handler to raise</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The sender of the event.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Event arguments for the event.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type of the event args.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    public static void Fire<T>(this EventHandler<T> ev, object sender, T e) where T : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ev == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Delegate del in ev.GetInvocationList())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ISynchronizeInvoke invoke = del.Target as ISynchronizeInvoke;Di2015NewLine                if (invoke != null && invoke.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    invoke.Invoke(del, new[] { sender, e });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    del.DynamicInvoke(sender, e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (TargetInvocationException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ex.InnerException.PreserveStackTrace();Di2015NewLine                throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called on a <see cref="TargetInvocationException"/> to preserve the stack trace that generated the inner exception.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">The exception to preserve the stack trace of.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void PreserveStackTrace(this Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ctx = new StreamingContext(StreamingContextStates.CrossAppDomain);Di2015NewLine        var mgr = new ObjectManager(null, ctx);Di2015NewLine        var si = new SerializationInfo(e.GetType(), new FormatterConverter());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        e.GetObjectData(si, ctx);Di2015NewLine        mgr.RegisterObject(e, 1, si);Di2015NewLine        mgr.DoFixups();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class Comparer : IComparer<Widget> , IEqualityComparer<Widget>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private int (int)x._values[this.ColumnToCompare]-(int)y._values[this.ColumnToCompare];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _builder.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _builder.Append(node.Name);Di2015NewLine        base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Visit(node.Left);Di2015NewLine        _builder.Append(GetOperator(node.NodeType));Di2015NewLine        base.Visit(node.Right);Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitLambda<T>(Expression<T> node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _builder.Append("function(");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; 5999849Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<System.IO.Stream> GetToplevelStreams(IObservable<byte> byteStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create((IObserver<System.IO.Stream> o) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int? size1=null;Di2015NewLine        int? size=null;Di2015NewLine        var buf = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        var subscription = byteStream.Subscribe(v =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!size1.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                size1 = ((int)v) << 8;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (!size.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                size = size1.Value + v;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buf.WriteByte(v);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (size.HasValue && buf.Length == size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buf.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(buf);Di2015NewLine                buf.SetLength(0);Di2015NewLine                size1 = null;Di2015NewLine                size = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }, (ex)=>o.OnError(ex), ()=>o.OnCompleted());Di2015NewLine        return () => subscription.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5999997Di2015UniqueSeparator        #region SecureString ManipulationDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Convert a Securestring to a regular string (not considered best practice, but make sure it's not in memory if you can help it)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="securePassword">Password stored in a secure string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>regular string of securestring password</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string ConvertToUnsecureString(this System.Security.SecureString securePassword)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (securePassword == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("securePassword");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr unmanagedString = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine 6002005Di2015UniqueSeparatorlibrary mydll;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  arr: array of array of Double;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprocedure ManagedToNative(RowCount, ColCount: Integer; Values: PDouble); stdcall;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  r, c: Integer;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  SetLength(arr, RowCount, ColCount);Di2015NewLine  for r := 0 to RowCount-1 do beginDi2015NewLine    for c := 0 to ColCount-1 do beginDi2015NewLine      arr[r,c] := Values^;Di2015NewLine      inc(Values);Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprocedure NativeToManaged(out RowCount, ColCount: Integer; Values: PDouble); stdcall;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  r, c: Integer;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  RowCount := Length(arr);Di2015NewLine  if RowCount>0 then beginDi2015NewLine    ColCount := Length(arr[0]);Di2015NewLine  end else beginDi2015NewLine    ColCount := 0;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  if Assigned(Values) then beginDi2015NewLine    for r := 0 to RowCount-1 do beginDi2015NewLine      for c := 0 to ColCount-1 do beginDi2015NewLine        Values^ := arr[r,c];Di2015NewLine        inc(Values);Di2015NewLine      end;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexportsDi2015NewLine  ManagedToNative,Di2015NewLine  NativeToManaged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLineend.Di2015NewLine
6002005Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DllImport(@"mydll.dll")]Di2015NewLine        private static extern void ManagedToNative(int RowCount, int ColCount, double[] Values);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport(@"mydll.dll")]Di2015NewLine        private static extern void NativeToManaged(out int RowCount, out int ColCount, double[] Values);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double[] Flattened(int RowCount, int ColCount, double[,] arr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double[] result = new double[RowCount*ColCount];Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < RowCount; r++)Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < ColCount; c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result[i] = arr[r,c];Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double[,] Expanded(int RowCount, int ColCount, double[] arr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double[,] result = new double[RowCount,ColCount];Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < RowCount; r++)Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < ColCount; c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result[r,c] = arr[i];Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int RowCount = 6;Di2015NewLine            const int ColCount = 9;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[,] arr = new double[RowCount,ColCount];Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < RowCount; r++)Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < ColCount; c++)Di2015NewLine                    arr[r,c] = r*c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ManagedToNative(RowCount, ColCount, Flattened(RowCount, ColCount, arr));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int myRowCount, myColCount;Di2015NewLine            NativeToManaged(out myRowCount, out myColCount, null);Di2015NewLine            double[] flat = new double[myRowCount * myColCount];Di2015NewLine            NativeToManaged(out myRowCount, out myColCount, flat);Di2015NewLine            double[,] expanded = Expanded(myRowCount, myColCount, flat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < RowCount; r++)Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < ColCount; c++)Di2015NewLine                    System.Console.WriteLine(arr[r, c] - expanded[r, c]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6003423Di2015UniqueSeparator bool keyDown = true; // true = down, false = upDi2015NewLine const uint WM_KEYDOWN = 0x0100;Di2015NewLine const uint WM_KEYUP = 0x0101;Di2015NewLine const int VK_RETURN = 0x0D;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine IntPtr handle = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine // Obtain the handle of the foreground window (active window and focus window are only relative to our own thread!!)Di2015NewLine IntPtr foreGroundWindow = GetForegroundWindow();Di2015NewLine // now get process id of foreground windowDi2015NewLine uint processID;Di2015NewLine uint threadID = GetWindowThreadProcessId(foreGroundWindow, out processID);Di2015NewLine if (processID != 0)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine // now get element with (keyboard) focus from processDi2015NewLine GUITHREADINFO threadInfo = new GUITHREADINFO();Di2015NewLine threadInfo.cbSize = Marshal.SizeOf(threadInfo);Di2015NewLine GetGUIThreadInfo(threadID, out threadInfo);Di2015NewLine handle = (IntPtr)threadInfo.hwndFocus;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine int lParam = 1 << 24; // this specifies NumPad key (extended key)Di2015NewLine lParam |= (keyDown) ? 0 : (1 << 30 | 1 << 31); // mark key as pressed if we use keyup messageDi2015NewLine PostMessage(handle, (keyDown) ? WM_KEYDOWN : WM_KEYUP, VK_RETURN, lParam); // send enterDi2015NewLine

6004113Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int count = 3;Di2015NewLine    private ConcurrentQueue<StreamWriter> queue = new ConcurrentQueue<StreamWriter>();Di2015NewLine    private Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(count, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Processor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Populate the resource queue.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) queue.Enqueue(new StreamWriter("sample" + i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Process(int parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Wait for one of our resources to become free.Di2015NewLine        semaphore.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        StreamWriter resource;Di2015NewLine        queue.TryDequeue(out resource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dispatch the work to a task.Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Process(resource, parameter));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Process(StreamWriter resource, int parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do work in background with resource.Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(random.Next(10) * 100);Di2015NewLine        resource.WriteLine("Parameter = {0}", parameter);Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(resource);Di2015NewLine        semaphore.Release();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6011567Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void PlaySoundInDevice(int deviceNumber, string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (outputDevices.ContainsKey(deviceNumber))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            outputDevices[deviceNumber].WaveOut.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            outputDevices[deviceNumber].WaveStream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var waveOut = new WaveOut();Di2015NewLine        waveOut.DeviceNumber = deviceNumber;Di2015NewLine        WaveStream waveReader = new WaveFileReader(fileName);Di2015NewLine        // hold onto the WaveOut and  WaveStream so we can dispose them laterDi2015NewLine        outputDevices[deviceNumber] = new PlaybackSession { WaveOut=waveOut, WaveStream=waveReader };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        waveOut.Init(waveReader);Di2015NewLine        waveOut.Play();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, PlaybackSession> outputDevices = new Dictionary<int, PlaybackSession>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class PlaybackSessionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IWavePlayer WaveOut { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public WaveStream WaveStream { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6012497Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication9 {Di2015NewLine  class Program {Di2015NewLine    public static void Main() {Di2015NewLine      Crazy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static unsafe void Crazy() {Di2015NewLine      short[] RawData={Di2015NewLine        0x000, 0x111, 0x222, 0x333, 0x444, 0x555, 0x666, 0x777, 0x888,Di2015NewLine        0x999, 0xaaa, 0xbbb, 0xccc, 0xddd, 0xeee, 0xfff, 0x123, 0x456,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //extra sentinel value which is just here to demonstrate that the algorithmDi2015NewLine        //doesn't go too farDi2015NewLine        0xbad Di2015NewLine      };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      const int ImageHeight=2;Di2015NewLine      const int ImageWidth=9;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var numShorts=ImageHeight*ImageWidth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      fixed(short* rawDataAsShortPtr=RawData) {Di2015NewLine        var nextLong=(long*)rawDataAsShortPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //1 chunk of 4 longsDi2015NewLine        // ==8 intsDi2015NewLine        // ==16 shortsDi2015NewLine        while(numShorts>=16) {Di2015NewLine          *nextLong=*nextLong<<4;Di2015NewLine          nextLong++;Di2015NewLine          *nextLong=*nextLong<<4;Di2015NewLine          nextLong++;Di2015NewLine          *nextLong=*nextLong<<4;Di2015NewLine          nextLong++;Di2015NewLine          *nextLong=*nextLong<<4;Di2015NewLine          nextLong++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          numShorts-=16;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var nextShort=(short*)nextLong;Di2015NewLine        while(numShorts>0) {Di2015NewLine          *nextShort=(short)(*nextShort<<4);Di2015NewLine          nextShort++;Di2015NewLine          numShorts--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach(var item in RawData) {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Print("{0:X4}", item);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6013843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool Equals(Object objA, Object objB) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // handle situation where both objects are null or both the same referenceDi2015NewLine    if (objA == objB)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    // both are not null, so if any is null they can't be equalDi2015NewLine    if (objA == null || objB == null)Di2015NewLine        return false; Di2015NewLine    // nulls are already handled, so it's now safe to call objA.EqualsDi2015NewLine    return objA.Equals(objB);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
